194 subroutine prep_startup
195  logical :: l
196  !initialise used modules
197  call topo_startup ! empty
198  call prmfile_startup ! empty
199  call parse_startup ! some code
200  call index_startup ! empty
201 
202  !initialize preference module & add user-settable variables
203  call pref_initialize() ! ! allocates mem for p(:)
204 
205  l = pref_add('solvent_pack', rval=solvent_pack)
206  l = pref_add('solvent_names', sval=solvent_names)
207  l = pref_add('solute_density', rval=rho_solute)
208  l = pref_add('random_seed_solute', ival=random_seed_solute)
209  l = pref_add('random_seed_solvent', ival=random_seed_solvent)
210  pi = 4.0 * atan(1.0)
211  deg2rad = pi/180.0
212 
213  !make sure all arrays are allocated so that solvation can be done
214  !without reading solute pdb file
215  call allocate_for_pdb(1,1,1)
216  call cleartop ! clears pdb filename and prm name
217  CALL clearpdb !get rid of old PDB data
218 end subroutine prep_startup
219

222 subroutine allocate_for_pdb(atoms, residues, molecules)
223 !arguments
224  integer, intent(in) :: atoms, residues, molecules
225  allocate(xtop(3*atoms), heavy(atoms), makeh(atoms), &
226  res(residues), istart_mol(molecules), &
227  stat=alloc_status)
228 
229  if(alloc_status /= 0) then
230  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Out of memory when allocating arrays for new atoms'
231  stop 255
232  end if
233 
234 end subroutine allocate_for_pdb

268 subroutine addbond
269 ! *** local variables
270  integer :: ia, ja
271  real(8) :: bond_dist, rij(3)
272  character(len=80) :: reply
273  integer :: readstat
274 
275  call get_string_arg(reply, &
276  '-----> First atom (number or residue:atom_name): ')
277  if(scan(reply, ':') > 0) then !got res:at
278  ia=get_atom_from_descriptor(reply)
279  if(ia== 0) then
280  write(*,910) trim(reply)
281 910 format('>>>>> ERROR: Could not find atom ',a)
282  return
283  end if
284  else !got atom number
285  read(reply, *, iostat=readstat) ia
286  if(readstat /= 0) then
287  write(*,910) trim(reply)
288  return
289  end if
290  end if
291  if(ia > nat_pro .or. ia < 1) then
292  write(*,'(a)') 'Out of range!'
293  return
294  end if
295  call get_string_arg(reply, &
296  '-----> Second atom (number or residue:atom_name): ')
297  if(scan(reply, ':') > 0) then !got res:at
298  ja=get_atom_from_descriptor(reply)
299  if(ja== 0) then
300  write(*,910) trim(reply)
301  return
302  end if
303  else !got atom number
304  read(reply, *, iostat=readstat) ja
305  if(readstat /= 0) then
306  write(*,910) trim(reply)
307  return
308  end if
309  end if
310  if(ja > nat_pro .or. ja < 1) then
311  write(*,'(a)') 'Out of range!'
312  return
313  elseif(ja == ia) then
314  write(*,'(a)') 'First and second atom must be different!'
315  return
316  end if
317  rij(:) = xtop(3*ia-2:3*ia) - xtop(3*ja-2:3*ja)
318  bond_dist = sqrt(dot_product(rij,rij))
319  if(bond_dist > max_xlink) then
320  write(*,100) bond_dist
321 100 format('>>> WARNING: Bond distance is',f6.2,' A.')
322  call get_string_arg(reply, '-----> Make bond anyway (y/n)? ')
323  call upcase(reply)
324  if(reply /= 'Y' .and. reply /= 'YES') then
325  return
326  end if
327  end if
328  if(nextrabnd < max_extrabnd) then
329  nextrabnd = nextrabnd+1
330  extrabnd(nextrabnd)%i = ia
331  extrabnd(nextrabnd)%j = ja
332  else
333  write(*,900) max_extrabnd
334 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Too many extra bonds. (Max ',i5,')')
335  end if
336 
337 end subroutine addbond
338

340 
341 subroutine clearbond
342  !clear extra bonds
343  nextrabnd = 0
344 end subroutine clearbond

348 subroutine angle_ene(emax, nlarge, av_ene)
349 ! *** local variables
350  integer i, j, k, ia, ic, istart, iend, i3, j3, k3, nlarge
351  real rji(3), rjk(3), bji, bjk, scp, angle, da, ae, dv, f1, di(3),&
352  dk(3)
353  real emax, av_ene
354 
355 
356  istart = 1
357  iend = nangles
358  nlarge = 0
359  av_ene = 0
360 
361  do ia = istart, iend
362 
363  i = ang(ia)%i
364  j = ang(ia)%j
365  k = ang(ia)%k
366  ic = ang(ia)%cod
367  if(ic == 0) then !missing parameter
368  write(*, '(4i5,1x,a)') ia, i, j, k, 'MISSING PARAMETERS'
369  cycle
370  end if
371  i3 = i * 3 - 3
372  j3 = j * 3 - 3
373  k3 = k * 3 - 3
374  rji(1) = xtop(i3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
375  rji(2) = xtop(i3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
376  rji(3) = xtop(i3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
377  rjk(1) = xtop(k3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
378  rjk(2) = xtop(k3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
379  rjk(3) = xtop(k3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
380  bji = sqrt(rji(1) **2 + rji(2) **2 + rji(3) **2)
381  bjk = sqrt(rjk(1) **2 + rjk(2) **2 + rjk(3) **2)
382  scp =(rji(1) * rjk(1) + rji(2) * rjk(2) + rji(3) * rjk(3) )
383  scp = scp /(bji * bjk)
384  if(scp>1.0) scp = 1.0
385  if(scp< - 1.0) scp = - 1.0
386  angle = acos(scp)
387  da = angle - anglib(ic)%ang0 * pi / 180.
388  ae = 0.5 * anglib(ic)%fk * da**2
389  av_ene = av_ene+ae
390 
391  if(ae>emax) then
392  nlarge = nlarge+1
393  write( * , '(5i5,4f8.2)') ia, i, j, k, ic, anglib(ic)%fk ,&
394  anglib(ic)%ang0, angle * 180. / pi, ae
395  endif
396 
397  enddo
398 
399  if(nangles/=0) av_ene = av_ene / real(nangles)
400 
401 !.......................................................................
402 end subroutine angle_ene
403

406 integer function anglecode(taci, tacj, tack)
407 !arguments
408  character(*), intent(in) :: taci, tacj, tack
409 ! *** local variables
410  integer i
411 
412  character(len=KEYLENGTH) :: ti, tj, tk
413 
414  ti = wildcard_tac(taci)
415  tj = wildcard_tac(tacj)
416  tk = wildcard_tac(tack)
417 
418 !.......................................................................
419  do i = 1, nang_types
420  if((ti == ang_types(i)%taci .and. tj == ang_types(i)%tacj &
421  .and. tk == ang_types(i)%tack) .or. (ti==ang_types(i)%tack &
422  .and. tj == ang_types(i)%tacj .and. tk == ang_types(i)%taci)) then
423  anglecode = ang_types(i)%cod
424  return
425  endif
426  enddo
427 
428  anglecode = 0
429  write( * , '(a,3(1x,a8))') '>>> Missing angle type for atom types' &
430  , ti, tj, tk
431  topo_ok = .false.
432 !.......................................................................
433 end function anglecode

437 subroutine bond_ene(emax, nlarge, av_ene)
438 ! *** local variables
439  integer i, j, ib, ic, istart, iend, i3, j3, nlarge
440  real rij(3), b, db, be, dv, emax, av_ene
441 
442 !.......................................................................
443 
444  istart = 1
445  iend = nbonds
446  nlarge = 0
447  av_ene = 0
448 
449  do ib = istart, iend
450 
451  i = bnd(ib)%i
452  j = bnd(ib)%j
453  ic = bnd(ib)%cod
454  if(ic == 0) then !missing parameter
455  write(*, '(3i5,1x,a)') ib, i, j, 'MISSING PARAMETERS'
456  cycle
457  end if
458 
459  i3 = i * 3 - 3
460  j3 = j * 3 - 3
461  rij(1) = xtop(j3 + 1) - xtop(i3 + 1)
462  rij(2) = xtop(j3 + 2) - xtop(i3 + 2)
463  rij(3) = xtop(j3 + 3) - xtop(i3 + 3)
464  b = sqrt(rij(1) **2 + rij(2) **2 + rij(3) **2)
465  db = b - bondlib(ic)%bnd0
466  be = 0.5 * bondlib(ic)%fk * db**2
467  av_ene = av_ene+be
468 
469  if(be>emax) then
470  nlarge = nlarge+1
471  write( * , '(4i5,4f8.2)') ib, i, j, ic, bondlib(ic)%fk,&
472  bondlib(ic)%bnd0, b, be
473  endif
474 
475  enddo
476 
477  if(nbonds/=0) av_ene = av_ene / real(nbonds)
478 
479  return
480 !.......................................................................
481 end subroutine bond_ene

485 character(KEYLENGTH) function wildcard_tac(taci)
486 !arguments
487  character(*), intent(in) :: taci
488 ! *** local variables
489  integer :: hash_pos
490  !find # sign and truncate there - will match anything after
491  hash_pos = scan(taci, '#')
492  if(hash_pos > 0) then
493  wildcard_tac = taci(1:hash_pos-1)
494  else
495  wildcard_tac = taci
496  endif
497 end function wildcard_tac
498 
499 integer function bondcode(taci, tacj)
500 !arguments
501  character(*), intent(in) :: taci, tacj
502 ! *** local variables
503  character(len=KEYLENGTH) :: ti, tj
504  integer i
505  integer :: leni, lenj
506  integer :: score, max_score = 0, max_cod
507 !.......................................................................
508 
509  ti = wildcard_tac(taci)
510  tj = wildcard_tac(tacj)
511 
512  do i = 1, nbnd_types
513  if(ti==bnd_types(i)%taci .and. tj==bnd_types(i)%tacj &
514  .or. tj==bnd_types(i)%taci .and. ti==bnd_types(i)%tacj) then
515 
516  bondcode = bnd_types(i)%cod
517  return
518  endif
519  enddo
520 
521  write( * , '(a,2(1x,a8))') '>>> Missing bond type for atom types' &
522  , ti, tj
523  topo_ok = .false.
524  bondcode = 0
525 
526 !.......................................................................
527 end function bondcode

531 subroutine changeimp
532 ! *** local variables
533  integer ii, ip, i, j, k, l, noptimp, nchange, nlarge
534  real emax, av_ene
535 
536 !.......................................................................
537 
538  write( * , '(/,a)') ' Two options: 1. change specified impropers'
539  write( * , '(a)') ' 2. change all with E > Emax(k <---> l)'
540  CALL prompt('-----> Which option [1/2]: ')
541  READ( *, * ) noptimp
542 
543  if(noptimp==1) then
544  CALL prompt('-----> No. of impropers to be changed = ')
545  READ( *, * ) nchange
546  do ii = 1, nchange
547  CALL prompt('-----> Give: Impr-no., i, j, k, l : ')
548  READ( *, * ) ip, i, j, k, l
549  imp(ip)%i = i
550  imp(ip)%j = j
551  imp(ip)%k = k
552  imp(ip)%l = l
553  enddo
554  endif
555 
556  if(noptimp==2) then
557  CALL prompt('-----> Give an energy threshold [kcal/mol] = ')
558  READ( *, * ) emax
559  nchange = 0
560  CALL impr_ene(emax, nchange, av_ene, 1)
561 
562  write( * , '(a,f8.2)') '< impr. tors energy > = ', av_ene
563  write( * , '(a,i5)') 'No. of changed imps = ', nchange
564 
565  CALL impr_ene(emax, nlarge, av_ene, 0)
566 
567  write( * , '(a,i5)') 'No. above Emax now = ', nlarge
568  write( * , '(a,f8.2)') '< impr. tors energy > = ', av_ene
569  endif
570 
571  write( *, * )
572 
573  return
574 !.......................................................................
575 end subroutine changeimp

676 function cross_product(a,b)
677  real(8) :: a(3), b(3), cross_product(3)
678 
679  cross_product(1) = a(2) * b(3) - a(3) * b(2)
680  cross_product(2) = a(3) * b(1) - a(1) * b(3)
681  cross_product(3) = a(1) * b(2) - a(2) * b(1)
682 end function cross_product

687 subroutine xlink
688 !add cross-linking bonds like SS-bridges
689 !locals
690  integer :: ires, jres, iat, jat, i, j, b
691  integer :: irc, jrc
692  real :: d2
693  character(len=1) :: reply
694 
695  if(.not. check_residues()) then
696  return
697  end if
698 
699  if(.not. topo_ok) then
700  write(*,90)
701 90 format('Making solute bond list.')
702  call make_solute_bonds
703  end if
704 
705 
706  write(*,92) max_xlink
707 92 format('Searching for non-bonded heavy atom pairs closer than', f6.2,' A.')
708 
709  !loop over all residue pairs
710  do ires = 1, (nres_solute-1)
711  irc = res(ires)%irc
712  do jres = ires+1, nres_solute
713  jrc = res(jres)%irc
714  do iat=1, lib(irc)%nat
715  i = iat + res(ires)%start-1
716  if(.not. heavy(i)) cycle !skip hydrogens
717 jloop: do jat=1, lib(jrc)%nat-1
718  j = jat+res(jres)%start-1
719  if(.not. heavy(j)) cycle !skip hydrogens
720  !check distance
721  d2=(xtop(3*i-2)-xtop(3*j-2))**2+ &
722  (xtop(3*i-1)-xtop(3*j-1))**2+(xtop(3*i)-xtop(3*j))**2
723  if(d2 < max_xlink**2) then
724  !found atom pair within limit Å, loop over all bonds
725  do b=1, nbonds
726  if(bnd(b)%i == i .and. bnd(b)%j == j) cycle jloop
727  if(bnd(b)%i == j .and. bnd(b)%j == i) cycle jloop
728  end do
729  !By now we know the atoms are not bonded
730  write(*,100, advance='no') i, trim(lib(irc)%nam), &
731  ires, trim(lib(irc)%atnam(iat)), &
732  j, trim(lib(jrc)%nam), jres, &
733  trim(lib(jrc)%atnam(jat)), sqrt(d2)
734  !add
735  read(*,*) reply
736  if(reply=='N' .or. reply=='n') cycle
737  if(nextrabnd < max_extrabnd) then
738  nextrabnd = nextrabnd+1
739  extrabnd(nextrabnd)%i = i
740  extrabnd(nextrabnd)%j = j
741  else
742  write(*,900) max_extrabnd
743 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Too many extra bonds. (Max ',i5,')')
744  end if
745 
746  end if
747  end do jloop
748  end do
749  end do
750  end do
751 
752  !issue a warning if the topology was already made.
753  if(nextrabnd > 0) then
754  write(*,110) nextrabnd
755 110 format(i3,' bonds were added.')
756  if(topo_ok) then
757  write(*,120)
758  end if
759 120 format('You need to regenerate the topology with the added bonds.')
760  end if
761 
762 100 format('Atoms',i6,1x,a,1x,i5,':',a,' and',i6,1x,a,1x,i5,':',a,' are',f5.2,' A apart. Connect [Y/n]?')
763 end subroutine xlink

766 
767 integer function impcode(taci, tacj, tack, tacl)
768 !arguments
769  character(KEYLENGTH) :: taci, tacj, tack, tacl
770 ! *** local variables
771  integer i
772  character(KEYLENGTH) :: ti, tj, tk, tl
773  logical :: found1, found2, found3, found4
774  ti = wildcard_tac(taci)
775  tj = wildcard_tac(tacj)
776  tk = wildcard_tac(tack)
777  tl = wildcard_tac(tacl)
778 
779 
780 
781 !.......................................................................
782 
783  !find a match with four types (i and j and k and l)
784 ! do i = 1, nimp_prm
785 ! if( (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .or. &
786 ! ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj .or. &
787 ! ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .or. &
788 ! ti == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .and. &
789 !
790 ! (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .or. &
791 ! tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .or. &
792 ! tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .or. &
793 ! tj == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .and. &
794 !
795 ! (tk == imp_prm(i)%taci .or. &
796 ! tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .or. &
797 ! tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .or. &
798 ! tk == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .and. &
799 !
800 ! (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .or. &
801 ! tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj .or. &
802 ! tl == imp_prm(i)%tack .or. &
803 ! tl == imp_prm(i)%tacl)) then
804 !
805 ! impcode = i
806 ! return
807 ! endif
808 ! enddo
809 
810 
811  !find a match with four types (i and j and k and l)
812  do i = 1, nimp_prm
813  found1 = .false.
814  found2 = .false.
815  found3 = .false.
816  found4 = .false.
817 
818  if (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci) then
819  found1 = .true.
820  else if (ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) then
821  found2 = .true.
822  else if (ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) then
823  found3 = .true.
824  else if (ti == imp_prm(i)%tacl) then
825  found4 = .true.
826  endif
827 
828  if ((.not. found1) .and. (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci)) then
829  found1 = .true.
830  else if ((.not. found2) .and. (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
831  found2 = .true.
832  else if ((.not. found3) .and. (tj == imp_prm(i)%tack)) then
833  found3 = .true.
834  else if ((.not. found4) .and. (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacl)) then
835  found4 = .true.
836  endif
837 
838  if ((.not. found1) .and. (tk == imp_prm(i)%taci)) then
839  found1 = .true.
840  else if ((.not. found2) .and. (tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
841  found2 = .true.
842  else if ((.not. found3) .and. (tk == imp_prm(i)%tack)) then
843  found3 = .true.
844  else if ((.not. found4) .and. (tk == imp_prm(i)%tacl)) then
845  found4 = .true.
846  endif
847 
848  if ((.not. found1) .and. (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci)) then
849  found1 = .true.
850  else if ((.not. found2) .and. (tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
851  found2 = .true.
852  else if ((.not. found3) .and. (tl == imp_prm(i)%tack)) then
853  found3 = .true.
854  else if ((.not. found4) .and. (tl == imp_prm(i)%tacl)) then
855  found4 = .true.
856  endif
857 
858  if (found1 .and. found2 .and. found3 .and. found4) then
859  impcode = i
860  return
861  endif
862  enddo
863 
864 
865 
866 
867 
868 
869 
870 
871 
872 
873 
874 
875 
876 
877 
878  !now we have to handle force fields differently
879  select case (ff_type)
880  case (ff_gromos, ff_amber)
881  !find a match with three types (j and k and l) or
882  !(i and j and k)
883  do i = 1, nimp_prm
884 
885  if(imp_prm(i)%taci == '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tacl /='') then
886  ! for ? A* B C ...
887 
888  if((tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
889  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
890  tl == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .or. &
891 
892  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
893  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacl .and. &
894  tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
895 
896  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
897  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
898  tl == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .or. &
899 
900  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
901  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacl .and. &
902  tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
903 
904  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
905  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
906  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacl) .or. &
907 
908  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
909  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacl .and. &
910  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack)) then
911 
912  impcode = i
913  return
914  endif
915  elseif(imp_prm(i)%taci /= '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tacl =='') then
916  ! and for A* B C ? (2nd half) ...
917 
918  if((tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
919  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
920  tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
921 
922  (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
923  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
924  tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
925 
926  (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
927  tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
928  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
929 
930  (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
931  tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
932  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
933 
934  (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
935  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
936  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
937 
938  (tj == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
939  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
940  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
941 
942  impcode = i
943  return
944  endif
945  endif
946  enddo
947 
948  !find a match with two types (j and (i or k or l))
949  do i = 1, nimp_prm
950 
951  if(imp_prm(i)%taci == '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tacl =='') then
952 
953  if((tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
954  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
955 
956  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
957  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
958 
959  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
960  (tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
961 
962  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
963  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
964 
965  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
966  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
967 
968  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
969  (tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
970 
971 
972 
973  impcode = i
974  return
975  endif
976  endif
977  enddo
978 
979  !find a match with only type of j atom
980  do i = 1, nimp_prm
981  if(imp_prm(i)%taci == '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tack =='' .and. &
982  imp_prm(i)%tacl =='')then
983  if(tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj) then
984  impcode = i
985  return
986  endif
987  endif
988  enddo
989 
990 
991  case (ff_charmm)
992 
993  !find a match with three types (j and k and l) or
994  !(i and j and k)
995  do i = 1, nimp_prm
996  if(imp_prm(i)%taci /= '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tacl =='') then
997  if((ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
998  tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
999  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1000 
1001  (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1002  tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1003  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1004 
1005  (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1006  tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
1007  tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1008 
1009  (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1010  tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1011  tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1012 
1013  (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1014  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
1015  tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1016 
1017  (ti == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1018  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1019  tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1020 
1021  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1022  tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
1023  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1024 
1025  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1026  tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1027  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1028 
1029  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1030  tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
1031  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1032 
1033  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1034  tj == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1035  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1036 
1037  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1038  tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. &
1039  ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1040 
1041  (tl == imp_prm(i)%taci .and. &
1042  tk == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. &
1043  ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
1044 
1045  impcode = i
1046  return
1047  endif
1048  endif
1049  enddo
1050 
1051  !find a match with two types (j and (i or k or l))
1052  do i = 1, nimp_prm
1053 
1054  if(imp_prm(i)%taci == '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tacl =='') then
1055 
1056  if((ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1057  (ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1058 
1059  (ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1060  (ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1061 
1062  (ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1063  (ti == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1064 
1065  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1066  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1067 
1068  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1069  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tk == imp_prm(i)%tacj) .or. &
1070 
1071  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tacj .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tack) .or. &
1072  (tl == imp_prm(i)%tack .and. tj == imp_prm(i)%tacj)) then
1073 
1074  impcode = i
1075  return
1076  endif
1077  endif
1078  enddo
1079 
1080  !find a match with only type of j atom
1081  do i = 1, nimp_prm
1082  if(imp_prm(i)%taci == '' .and. imp_prm(i)%tack =='' .and. &
1083  imp_prm(i)%tacl =='')then
1084  if(ti == imp_prm(i)%tacj) then
1085  impcode = i
1086  return
1087  endif
1088  endif
1089  enddo
1090 
1091  end select
1092 
1093  impcode = 0
1094  write( * , '(a,4(1x,a8))') '>>> Missing improper type for atom types', &
1095  ti, tj, tk, tl
1096  topo_ok = .false.
1097 
1098 !.......................................................................
1099 end function impcode

1101 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1102 
1103 subroutine impr_ene(emax, nlarge, av_ene, mode)
1104 ! *** local variables
1105  integer i, j, k, l, ip, ic, i3, j3, k3, l3, nlarge, mode
1106  real rji(3), rjk(3), rkl(3), rnj(3), rnk(3), bj, bk, scp, &
1107  phi, sgn, pe, dv, rki(3), rlj(3), dp(12), arg, f1, di(3), &
1108  dl(3)
1109  real emax, av_ene
1110 
1111 !.......................................................................
1112 
1113  nlarge = 0
1114  av_ene = 0
1115 
1116  do ip = 1, nimps
1117 
1118  i = imp(ip)%i
1119  j = imp(ip)%j
1120  k = imp(ip)%k
1121  l = imp(ip)%l
1122  ic = imp(ip)%cod
1123  if(ic == 0) then !missing parameter
1124  write(*, '(5i5,1x,a)') ip, i, j, k, l, 'MISSING PARAMETERS'
1125  cycle
1126  end if
1127  i3 = i * 3 - 3
1128  j3 = j * 3 - 3
1129  k3 = k * 3 - 3
1130  l3 = l * 3 - 3
1131  rji(1) = xtop(i3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
1132  rji(2) = xtop(i3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
1133  rji(3) = xtop(i3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
1134  rjk(1) = xtop(k3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
1135  rjk(2) = xtop(k3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
1136  rjk(3) = xtop(k3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
1137  rkl(1) = xtop(l3 + 1) - xtop(k3 + 1)
1138  rkl(2) = xtop(l3 + 2) - xtop(k3 + 2)
1139  rkl(3) = xtop(l3 + 3) - xtop(k3 + 3)
1140  rnj(1) = rji(2) * rjk(3) - rji(3) * rjk(2)
1141  rnj(2) = rji(3) * rjk(1) - rji(1) * rjk(3)
1142  rnj(3) = rji(1) * rjk(2) - rji(2) * rjk(1)
1143  rnk(1) = - rjk(2) * rkl(3) + rjk(3) * rkl(2)
1144  rnk(2) = - rjk(3) * rkl(1) + rjk(1) * rkl(3)
1145  rnk(3) = - rjk(1) * rkl(2) + rjk(2) * rkl(1)
1146  bj = sqrt(rnj(1) **2 + rnj(2) **2 + rnj(3) **2)
1147  bk = sqrt(rnk(1) **2 + rnk(2) **2 + rnk(3) **2)
1148  scp =(rnj(1) * rnk(1) + rnj(2) * rnk(2) + rnj(3) * rnk(3) )/(bj * bk)
1149  if(scp>1.0) scp = 1.0
1150  if(scp< - 1.0) scp = - 1.0
1151  phi = acos(scp)
1152  sgn = rjk(1) *(rnj(2) * rnk(3) - rnj(3) * rnk(2) ) + rjk(2)&
1153  *(rnj(3) * rnk(1) - rnj(1) * rnk(3) ) + rjk(3) *(rnj(1) &
1154  * rnk(2) - rnj(2) * rnk(1) )
1155  if(sgn<0) phi = - phi
1156 
1157 ! --- energy
1158  if(imp_type == 1) then !harmonic
1159  arg = phi - implib(ic)%imp0 * pi / 180.
1160  arg = arg - 2. * pi * nint(arg /(2. * pi) )
1161  dv = implib(ic)%fk * arg
1162  pe = 0.5 * dv * arg
1163  else !periodic
1164  arg = 2*phi - implib(ic)%imp0 * pi / 180.
1165  pe = implib(ic)%fk * (1 + cos(arg))
1166  dv = -2*implib(ic)%fk * sin(arg)
1167  end if
1168 
1169  av_ene = av_ene+pe
1170 
1171  if(pe>emax) then
1172  nlarge = nlarge+1
1173  if(mode==0) write( * , '(6i5,5f8.2)') ip, i, j, k, l, ic, &
1174  implib(ic)%fk , implib(ic)%imp0 , phi * 180. / pi, pe
1175  if(mode==1) then
1176  imp(ip)%i = i
1177  imp(ip)%j = j
1178  imp(ip)%k = l
1179  imp(ip)%l = k
1180  endif
1181  endif
1182 
1183  enddo
1184 
1185  if(nimps/=0) av_ene = av_ene / real(nimps)
1186 
1187 !.......................................................................
1188 end subroutine impr_ene
1189 
1190 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1191 
1192 subroutine listres
1193 ! *** local variables
1194  integer i, iat, ires
1195  type(lib_entry_type), pointer:: lp
1196 !.......................................................................
1197 
1198  ires = get_int_arg('-----> Residue number: ')
1199  if(ires > nres .or. ires == 0) then
1200  write(*,*) 'Out of range!'
1201  return
1202  end if
1203  if(.not. check_residues()) return
1204  lp => lib(res(ires)%irc )
1205  write( * , '(a,i5,a,a)') 'Residue ', ires, ' is ', res(ires)%name
1206 
1207  write( * , '(a)') 'Atom name tac charge '

1211  lp%tac_lib(i), lp%crg_lib(i)
1212  enddo

1235 subroutine make14list
1236 ! *** local variables

1238 
1239 
1240 
1241 
1242  n14nbrs = 0
1243  n14long = 0
1244  list14(:, :) = .false.
1245 
1246 itloop: do it = 1, ntors
1247 
1248 
1249 
1250  i = tor(it)%i
1251  j = tor(it)%l

1253  ioff = j - i

1256  n14nbrs = n14nbrs + 1
1257  list14(ioff, i) = .true.

1262  !it's already in here

1264  end if
1265  end do
1266  n14long = n14long + 1
1267  list14long(1, n14long) = i
1268  list14long(2, n14long) = j
1269  endif
1270  ELSE
1271  ioff = i - j
1272  if(ioff<=max_nbr_range) then
1273  if(.not. list14(ioff, j)) then
1274  n14nbrs = n14nbrs + 1
1275  list14(ioff, j) = .true.
1276  end if
1277  ELSE
1278  do l = 1, n14long
1279  if(list14long(1,l) == j .and. list14long(2,l) == i) then
1280  !it's already in here
1281  cycle itloop
1282  end if
1283  end do
1284  n14long = n14long + 1
1285  list14long(1, n14long) = j
1286  list14long(2, n14long) = i
1287  endif
1288  endif
1289  enddo itloop
1290

1301 subroutine makeangles
1302 ! *** local variables
1303  integer ib, jb, ia, i, j, k, iaci, iacj, iack
1304  logical :: used(nang_prm+max_extrabnd)
1305  integer :: itrans(nang_prm+max_extrabnd)
1306 
1307 !.......................................................................
1308 
1309  nangles = 0
1310  nangles_solute = 0
1311 
1312  do ib = 1, nbonds_solute - 1
1313  !skip special bonds used only to specify shake constraints
1314  if(bnd(ib)%cod == 0) cycle
1315  if(bondlib(bnd(ib)%cod)%fk == 0.) cycle
1316  do jb = ib + 1, nbonds_solute
1317  if(bnd(jb)%cod == 0) cycle
1318  if(bondlib(bnd(jb)%cod)%fk == 0.) cycle
1319 
1320  if(bnd(ib)%i == bnd(jb)%i ) then
1321  nangles = nangles + 1
1322  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%j
1323  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%i
1324  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%j
1325  elseif(bnd(ib)%i ==bnd(jb)%j ) then
1326  nangles = nangles + 1
1327  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%j
1328  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%i
1329  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%i
1330  elseif(bnd(ib)%j ==bnd(jb)%i ) then
1331  nangles = nangles + 1
1332  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%i
1333  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%j
1334  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%j
1335  elseif(bnd(ib)%j ==bnd(jb)%j ) then
1336  nangles = nangles + 1
1337  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%i
1338  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%j
1339  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%i
1340  endif
1341 
1342  enddo
1343  enddo
1344  nangles_solute = nangles
1345  write(*, 100) nangles_solute, 'solute'
1346 100 format('Made ',i6,1x,a,' angles.')
1347 
1348  do ib = nbonds_solute+1, nbonds - 1
1349  !skip special bonds used only to specify shake constraints
1350  if(bondlib(bnd(ib)%cod)%fk == 0.) cycle
1351  do jb = ib + 1, nbonds
1352  if(bondlib(bnd(jb)%cod)%fk == 0.) cycle
1353 
1354  if(bnd(ib)%i == bnd(jb)%i ) then
1355  nangles = nangles + 1
1356  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%j
1357  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%i
1358  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%j
1359  elseif(bnd(ib)%i ==bnd(jb)%j ) then
1360  nangles = nangles + 1
1361  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%j
1362  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%i
1363  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%i
1364  elseif(bnd(ib)%j ==bnd(jb)%i ) then
1365  nangles = nangles + 1
1366  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%i
1367  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%j
1368  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%j
1369  elseif(bnd(ib)%j ==bnd(jb)%j ) then
1370  nangles = nangles + 1
1371  ang(nangles)%i = bnd(ib)%i
1372  ang(nangles)%j = bnd(ib)%j
1373  ang(nangles)%k = bnd(jb)%i
1374  endif
1375  enddo
1376  enddo
1377  write(*, 100) nangles-nangles_solute, 'solvent'
1378 
1379  do ia = 1, nangles
1380  ang(ia)%cod = anglecode(tac(iac(ang(ia)%i)), tac(iac(ang(ia)%j)), tac(iac(ang(ia)%k)))
1381  if(ang(ia)%cod == 0) then
1382  write( * , * ) 'atoms: ', ang(ia)%i , ang(ia)%j , ang(ia)%k
1383  endif
1384  enddo
1385 
1386 ! --- Make a list of actual angle types to be used
1387  used(:) = .false.
1388 
1389  nangcod = 0
1390  do i = 1, nangles
1391  ! workaround to permit missing params
1392  if(ang(i)%cod /=0) then
1393  if(.not. used(ang(i)%cod)) then
1394  used(ang(i)%cod ) = .true.
1395  nangcod = nangcod+1
1396  itrans(ang(i)%cod ) = nangcod
1397  !copy all parameters for this angle type from parameter list to top
1398  anglib(nangcod) = ang_prm(ang(i)%cod)
1399  ang(i)%cod = nangcod
1400  ELSE
1401  ang(i)%cod = itrans(ang(i)%cod )
1402  endif
1403  endif
1404  enddo
1405 
1406 end subroutine makeangles

1463 integer function makeextrabonds()
1464  !locals
1465  integer :: ix, ib,iaci, iacj
1466  character(len=KEYLENGTH) :: taci, tacj
1467 
1468 ! --- Add extra bonds like S-S bridges
1469 
1470  makeextrabonds = 0
1471 
1472 extra:do ix = 1, nextrabnd
1473  do ib = 1, nbonds
1474  if((bnd(ib)%i==extrabnd(ix)%i .and. bnd(ib)%j==extrabnd(ix)%j) &
1475  .or. (bnd(ib)%j==extrabnd(ix)%i &
1476  .and. bnd(ib)%i==extrabnd(ix)%j)) then
1477  write(*,8) extrabnd(ix)%i, extrabnd(ix)%j
1478  cycle extra
1479  end if
1480  end do
1481  nbonds = nbonds + 1
1482  makeextrabonds=makeextrabonds+1
1483  bnd(nbonds)%i = extrabnd(ix)%i
1484  bnd(nbonds)%j = extrabnd(ix)%j
1485  taci = tac(iac(bnd(nbonds)%i ))
1486  tacj = tac(iac(bnd(nbonds)%j ))
1487 
1488  bnd(nbonds)%cod = bondcode(taci, tacj)
1489  end do extra
1490 
1491 8 format('>>> WARNING: Atoms',i5,' and',i5,' are already bonded.')
1492 
1493 end function makeextrabonds

1497 subroutine set_bondcodes
1498  !locals
1499  integer :: ib, iaci, iacj
1500  logical :: used(nbnd_prm)
1501  integer :: itrans(nbnd_prm)
1502  character(len=keylength) :: taci, tacj
1503 
1504  do ib = 1, nbonds
1505  iaci = iac(bnd(ib)%i)
1506  iacj = iac(bnd(ib)%j)
1507  taci = tac(iac(bnd(ib)%i))
1508  tacj = tac(iac(bnd(ib)%j))
1509  bnd(ib)%cod = bondcode(taci, tacj)
1510  IF(bnd(ib)%cod == 0) then
1511  WRITE( * , * ) 'atoms: ', bnd(ib)%i , bnd(ib)%j
1512  ENDIF
1513  end do
1514 
1515  !Make a list of actual bond types to be used
1516 
1517  used(:) = .false.
1518  nbndcod = 0
1519  do ib = 1, nbonds
1520  ! workaround to permit missing param's
1521  if(bnd(ib)%cod /=0) then
1522  if(.not. used(bnd(ib)%cod)) then
1523  used(bnd(ib)%cod) = .true.
1524  nbndcod = nbndcod+1
1525  itrans(bnd(ib)%cod ) = nbndcod
1526  bondlib(nbndcod) = bnd_prm(bnd(ib)%cod)%prm
1527  sybyl_bond_type(nbndcod) = bnd_prm(bnd(ib)%cod)%SYBYLtype
1528  bnd(ib)%cod = nbndcod
1529  ELSE
1530  bnd(ib)%cod = itrans(bnd(ib)%cod )
1531  endif
1532  endif
1533  enddo
1534 
1535 end subroutine set_bondcodes

1539 integer function makesomebonds(startres, endres)
1540 !arguments
1541  integer :: startres, endres
1542 
1543 ! *** local variables
1544  integer :: i, ib, ires, imol
1545 
1546  makesomebonds = 0
1547 
1548  if(startres > endres) return !if no solvent
1549 
1550  !determine starting molecule
1551  imol = 0
1552  do i = 1,nmol
1553  if(istart_mol(i) == res(startres)%start) exit
1554  imol = imol+1
1555  end do
1556  if(imol >= nmol) then
1557  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Inconsistent molecule/residue start atoms'
1558  return
1559  end if
1560 
1561  do ires = startres, endres
1562 
1563 ! --- start new molecule or attach to chain
1564  if(nmol>imol .and. res(ires)%start==istart_mol(imol + 1) ) then
1565  !it is a new molecule
1566  imol = imol + 1
1567  elseif(lib(res(ires-1)%irc)%tail > 0 .and. &
1568  lib(res(ires)%irc)%head > 0) then
1569  !make tail-to-head bond
1570  nbonds = nbonds + 1
1571  makesomebonds = makesomebonds + 1
1572  bnd(nbonds)%i = res(ires-1)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires-1)%irc)%tail
1573  bnd(nbonds)%j = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%head
1574  endif
1575 
1576  ! --- Build bonds in the residue
1577 
1578  do i = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc)%nbnd
1579 
1580  nbonds = nbonds + 1
1581  makesomebonds = makesomebonds + 1
1582  bnd(nbonds)%i = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%bnd(i)%i
1583  bnd(nbonds)%j = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%bnd(i)%j
1584  enddo
1585  enddo
1586 !.......................................................................
1587 end function makesomebonds

1591 subroutine makeexlist
1592 ! *** local variables
1593  integer ib, ia, i, j, ioff
1594 
1595 !.......................................................................
1596 
1597  nexnbrs = 0
1598  nexlong = 0
1599  listex(:, :) = .false.
1600 
1601  do ib = 1, nbonds
1602 
1603  i = bnd(ib)%i
1604  j = bnd(ib)%j
1605  if(i<j) then
1606  ioff = j - i
1607  if(ioff<=max_nbr_range) then
1608  nexnbrs = nexnbrs + 1
1609  listex(ioff, i) = .true.
1610  ELSE
1611  nexlong = nexlong + 1
1612  listexlong(1, nexlong) = i
1613  listexlong(2, nexlong) = j
1614  endif
1615  ELSE
1616  ioff = i - j
1617  if(ioff<=max_nbr_range) then
1618  nexnbrs = nexnbrs + 1
1619  listex(ioff, j) = .true.
1620  ELSE
1621  nexlong = nexlong + 1
1622  listexlong(1, nexlong) = j
1623  listexlong(2, nexlong) = i
1624  endif
1625  endif
1626 
1627  enddo
1628 
1629  do ia = 1, nangles
1630 
1631  i = ang(ia)%i
1632  j = ang(ia)%k
1633  if(i<j) then
1634  ioff = j - i
1635  if(ioff<=max_nbr_range) then
1636  nexnbrs = nexnbrs + 1
1637  listex(ioff, i) = .true.
1638  ELSE
1639  nexlong = nexlong + 1
1640  listexlong(1, nexlong) = i
1641  listexlong(2, nexlong) = j
1642  endif
1643  ELSE
1644  ioff = i - j
1645  if(ioff<=max_nbr_range) then
1646  nexnbrs = nexnbrs + 1
1647  listex(ioff, j) = .true.
1648  ELSE
1649  nexlong = nexlong + 1
1650  listexlong(1, nexlong) = j
1651  listexlong(2, nexlong) = i
1652  endif
1653  endif
1654 
1655  enddo
1656 
1657 
1658  write(*, 100) nexnbrs
1659  write(*, 110) nexlong
1660 100 format('Made ',i6,' entries in list of excluded neighbours.')
1661 110 format('Made ',i6,' entries in list of long-range excluded neighbours.')
1662 
1663  return
1664 !.......................................................................
1665 end subroutine makeexlist

1669 subroutine makehyds
1670 !local variables
1671  integer :: i, nh_solute, nh_solvent, nh_required
1672  real :: r
1673  integer :: atom, residue
1674 
1675  nh_required = 0
1676 
1677  !reassign heavy atom flag based on masses from parameter file
1678  do i = 1, nat_pro
1679  heavy(i) = .false.
1680  if(iaclib(iac(i))%mass >=4.0) heavy(i) = .true.
1681  if(makeh(i)) nh_required = nh_required+1
1682  enddo
1683 
1684  r=randm(random_seed_solute, seed_only=.true.)
1685  nh_solute = 0
1686  do residue = 1, nres_solute
1687  do atom = res(residue)%start, &
1688  res(residue)%start+lib(res(residue)%irc)%nat-1
1689  nh_solute = nh_solute + genh(atom, residue)
1690  end do
1691  end do
1692  write(*, 100) nh_solute, 'solute'
1693 100 format('Made ',i6,1x,a,' hydrogens.')
1694 
1695  !use a separate random number sequence for solvent
1696  r=randm(random_seed_solvent, seed_only=.true.)
1697  nh_solvent = 0
1698  do residue = nres_solute+1, nres
1699  do atom = res(residue)%start, &
1700  res(residue)%start+lib(res(residue)%irc)%nat - 1
1701  nh_solvent = nh_solvent + genh(atom, residue)
1702  end do
1703  end do
1704  write(*, 100) nh_solvent, 'solvent'
1705  if(nh_solute+nh_solvent/=nh_required) write( * , '(a,i5,/)') &
1706  '>>> Warning, no. of hydrogens required = ', nh_required
1707  makeh(:) = .false. !don't need to redo when making topology
1708 end subroutine makehyds
1709 
1710 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1711 
1712 integer function genh(j, residue)
1713 !arguments
1714  integer, intent(in) :: j, residue
1715 !locals
1716  real(8) :: xj(3), xk(3)
1717  integer :: ligand, h, kt, lt
1718  real(8) :: old_xh(3), xh(3), v, vtot, dv(3), dvlast(3), gamma, dvtot(3)
1719  real(8) :: vtotlast
1720  real(8) :: dx(3), dx_line, rms_dv
1721  real(8),parameter :: convergence_criterum = 0.1
1722  real(8),parameter :: dv_scale = 0.025
1723  real(8),parameter :: max_dx = 1. !max_dx is max distance of line search step in first CG iteration (Å)
1724  real(8) :: local_min = 30
1725  real(8) :: tors_fk = 10.
1726  integer, parameter :: max_cg_iterations = 100, max_line_iterations = 35
1727  integer :: cgiter, lineiter
1728  real(8) :: bnd0
1729  integer :: nhang, hang_atom(max_conn)
1730  integer :: hang_code(max_conn)
1731  integer :: rule
1732  type(lib_entry_type), pointer:: lp
1733  integer :: a, b, axis
1734  real(8) :: bond_length, db
1735  real(8) :: rjh(3), rjk(3), bjhinv, bjkinv
1736  real(8) :: scp, angle, angle_deg, dvangle, da, f1
1737  real(8) :: xkt(3), xlt(3), rjkt(3), rktlt(3)
1738  real(8) :: rnj(3), rnk(3), bj, bk
1739  real(8) :: phi, phi_deg, sgn, dvtors, arg, dh(3)
1740  logical :: flipped
1741  integer :: seth
1742  integer, parameter :: nseth = 5 !number of times to flip, if local min, and retry
1743 
1744  genh = 0
1745  xj(:) = xtop(3*j-2:3*j)
1746 
1747  !First find the bond, angle and torsion parameters to use
1748 
1749  !loop over connected atoms
1750  do ligand = 1, nconn(j)
1751 
1752  h = iconn(ligand, j)
1753  !is it an unmade H?
1754  if(makeh(h)) then
1755  !make this H
1756  !find the bond potential
1757  do b = 1, nbonds
1758  if((bnd(b)%i == j .and. bnd(b)%j == h) .or. &
1759  (bnd(b)%j == j .and. bnd(b)%i == h)) then
1760  if(bnd(b)%cod > 0) then
1761  bnd0 = bondlib(bnd(b)%cod)%bnd0
1762  else
1763  bnd0 = 1. !default when missing parameters
1764  endif
1765  exit
1766  end if
1767  end do
1768  !a unique Hbond_code will always be found
1769  !because list of connections is based on bond list
1770 
1771  !find all the angles
1772  nhang = 0
1773  do a = 1, nangles
1774  if(ang(a)%j == j .and. ang(a)%cod > 0) then
1775  if(ang(a)%i == h .and. .not. makeh(ang(a)%k)) then
1776  nhang = nhang + 1
1777  hang_atom(nhang) = ang(a)%k
1778  hang_code(nhang) = ang(a)%cod
1779  elseif(ang(a)%k == h .and. .not. makeh(ang(a)%i)) then
1780  nhang = nhang + 1
1781  hang_atom(nhang) = ang(a)%i
1782  hang_code(nhang) = ang(a)%cod
1783  end if
1784  end if
1785  end do
1786  !look up build rule
1787  lp => lib(res(residue)%irc)
1788  do rule = lp%nrules, 1, -1
1789  if(lp%rules(rule)%kind == build_rule_torsion) then
1790  if(lp%rules(rule)%atom(1) == h - res(residue)%start + 1 .and. &
1791  lp%rules(rule)%atom(2) == j - res(residue)%start + 1) then
1792  exit
1793  end if
1794  end if
1795  end do
1796 
1797  !find the torsion rule defined in the library, if any
1798  if(rule > 0) then
1799  kt = lp%rules(rule)%atom(3) + res(residue)%start - 1
1800  lt = lp%rules(rule)%atom(4) + res(residue)%start - 1
1801  xkt(:) = xtop(3*kt-2:3*kt)
1802  xlt(:) = xtop(3*lt-2:3*lt)
1803  rjkt(:) = xkt(:) - xj(:)
1804  rktlt(:) = xlt(:) - xkt(:)
1805  rnk(:) = -cross_product(rjkt, rktlt)
1806  bk = sqrt(dot_product(rnk, rnk))
1807  end if
1808  !generate initial co-ordinates for H
1809  !random vector
1810  do axis = 1,3
1811  xh(axis) = randm() - .5
1812  end do
1813  !normalise to unit length and scale by bond length from lib.
1814  bond_length = sqrt(dot_product(xh,xh))
1815  xh(:) = xh(:) / bond_length * bnd0
1816  !place near atom j
1817  xh(:) = xh(:) + xj(:)
1818 ! write(*,800) 0,H,xH(:)
1819  !conjugate gradient minimisation
1820  do seth = 1,nseth
1821  do cgiter = 1, max_cg_iterations
1822 ! write(*,9, advance='no') cgiter
1823 9 format('cg step',i3,':')
1824  !do line search
1825  dx_line = max_dx*2.**(-cgiter)
1826  flipped = .false.
1827  do lineiter = 1, max_line_iterations
1828  vtot = 0
1829  dvtot(:) = 0
1830  !calc. potential & gradient
1831  !angles
1832  rjh(:) = xh(:) - xj(:)
1833  do a = 1, nhang
1834  xk(:) = xtop(3*hang_atom(a)-2:3*hang_atom(a))
1835  rjk(:) = xk(:) - xj(:)
1836  bjhinv = 1./sqrt(dot_product(rjh, rjh))
1837  bjkinv = 1./sqrt(dot_product(rjk, rjk))
1838  ! calculate scp and angv
1839  scp = dot_product(rjh, rjk) * bjhinv*bjkinv
1840  if(scp > 1.) then
1841  scp = 1.
1842  else if(scp < -1.) then
1843  scp = -1.0
1844  end if
1845  angle = acos(scp)
1846  angle_deg = angle / deg2rad
1847  ! calculate da and dv
1848  da = angle - anglib(hang_code(a))%ang0*deg2rad
1849  v = 0.5*anglib(hang_code(a))%fk*da**2
1850  vtot = vtot + v
1851  dvangle = anglib(hang_code(a))%fk*da
1852  ! calculate f1
1853  f1 = sin( angle )
1854  ! avoid division by zero
1855  if ( abs(f1) < 1.e-12 ) then
1856  f1 = -1.e12
1857  else
1858  f1 = -1.0 / f1
1859  end if
1860  dv(:) = dvangle &
1861  * (f1*(rjk(:)*bjhinv*bjkinv - scp*rjh(:)*bjhinv*bjhinv))
1862  dvtot(:) = dvtot(:) + dv(:)
1863  end do
1864 
1865  !torsion
1866  if(rule > 0) then
1867  rnj(1) = rjh(2) * rjkt(3) - rjh(3) * rjkt(2)
1868  rnj(2) = rjh(3) * rjkt(1) - rjh(1) * rjkt(3)
1869  rnj(3) = rjh(1) * rjkt(2) - rjh(2) * rjkt(1)
1870  bj = sqrt(dot_product(rnj, rnj))
1871  scp =dot_product(rnj, rnk)/(bj * bk)
1872  if(scp>1.0) scp = 1.0
1873  if(scp< - 1.0) scp = - 1.0
1874  phi = acos(scp)
1875  phi_deg = phi / deg2rad
1876  sgn = rjkt(1) *(rnj(2) * rnk(3) - rnj(3) * rnk(2) ) &
1877  + rjkt(2) *(rnj(3) * rnk(1) - rnj(1) * rnk(3) ) &
1878  + rjkt(3) *(rnj(1) * rnk(2) - rnj(2) * rnk(1) )
1879  if(sgn<0) phi = - phi
1880  arg = phi-lp%rules(rule)%value*deg2rad
1881  v = tors_fk*(1.0+cos(arg))
1882  !note changed sign of dVtors to get min (not max) at rule value
1883  dvtors = +tors_fk*sin(arg)
1884 
1885  ! --- forces
1886 
1887  f1 = sin( phi )
1888  if ( abs(f1) .lt. 1.e-12 ) f1 = 1.e-12
1889  f1 = -1.0 / f1
1890  dh(:) = f1*(rnk(:)/(bj*bk) - scp*rnj(:)/(bj*bj))
1891  dv(:) = dvtors*cross_product(rjk, dh)
1892  dvtot(:) = dvtot(:) + dv(:)
1893  end if
1894  if(cgiter == 1 .and. lineiter == 1) then
1895  !its the start of the search, use the gradient vector
1896  dvlast(:) = dvtot(:)
1897  elseif(vtotlast < vtot) then
1898  dx_line = -dx_line !next step back
1899  flipped = .true.
1900  endif
1901  rms_dv = sqrt(abs(dot_product(dvtot, dvlast)))
1902  if(rms_dv < convergence_criterum / 10) then
1903  exit !reached a potential minimum along the search line
1904  endif
1905 
1906  !update position in line search
1907  dx(:) = -dvlast(:) / sqrt(dot_product(dvlast, dvlast)) * dx_line
1908  if(flipped) dx_line = 0.5 * dx_line !reduce step size only after first change of direction
1909  vtotlast = vtot
1910  xh(:) = xh(:) + dx(:)
1911  end do !lineiter
1912 
1913 ! write(*,*) lineiter
1914 
1915  rjh(:) = xh(:) - xj(:)
1916  bond_length = sqrt(dot_product(rjh, rjh))
1917  rjh(:) = rjh(:) / bond_length * bnd0 !adjust bond length
1918  xh(:) = xj(:) + rjh(:)
1919  rms_dv = sqrt(dot_product(dvtot,dvtot))
1920  if(rms_dv < convergence_criterum) then
1921  if(vtot < local_min) then
1922  !found global min
1923  exit
1924  else
1925  !it's a local min - flip 180 deg.
1926  dvlast(:) = -dvlast(:)
1927  xh(:) = xj(:) - rjh(:)
1928  end if
1929  end if
1930 
1931  !get new gradient search direction
1932  gamma = dot_product(dvtot, dvlast) / dot_product(dvlast, dvlast)
1933  !use conjugate gradient
1934  dvlast(:) = dvtot(:) - gamma*dvlast(:)
1935 
1936  end do !cgiter
1937 
1938  !Check if local min -> restart iteration ; problem with conversion
1939  if(vtot > local_min) then
1940  !it's a local min - flip 180 deg.
1941  dvlast(:) = -dvlast(:)
1942  xh(:) = xj(:) - rjh(:)
1943  else
1944  exit
1945  end if
1946  end do !setH
1947  !check if not converged
1948  if(cgiter >= max_cg_iterations .and. vtot > 3.0) then
1949  !display warning
1950  write(*,900) h, j, vtot
1951 900 format('>>> WARNING: Positioning of hydrogen',i6,&
1952  ' bound to atom',i6,' didn''t converge.',/, &
1953  'Potential is ',f8.3,' kcal/mol.')
1954  end if
1955  !copy coordinates to topology
1956  xtop(3*h-2:3*h) = xh(:)
1957  !clear makeH flag
1958  makeh(h) = .false.
1959  genh = genh + 1
1960  end if
1961  end do !hydrogens to make
1962 end function genh
1963

1966 subroutine makeimps
1967 ! *** local variables
1968  integer :: i
1969 
1970 !.......................................................................
1971 
1972  nimps = 0
1973  nimps_solute = 0
1974 
1975  do i = 1, nat_pro
1976  if(nconn(i) ==3) then
1977  nimps = nimps + 1
1978  if(i <= nat_solute) nimps_solute = nimps_solute + 1
1979  imp(nimps)%i = iconn(1, i)
1980  imp(nimps)%j = i
1981  imp(nimps)%k = iconn(2, i)
1982  imp(nimps)%l = iconn(3,i)
1983  end if
1984  enddo
1985 
1986 end subroutine makeimps

1990 subroutine imp_params
1991 ! *** local variables
1992  integer i, ii, iaci, iacj, iack, iacl
1993  integer iused(nimp_prm+max_extrabnd), itrans(nimp_prm+max_extrabnd)
1994 
1995 
1996  do i = 1, nimps
1997  iaci = iac(imp(i)%i )
1998  iacj = iac(imp(i)%j )
1999  iack = iac(imp(i)%k )
2000  iacl = iac(imp(i)%l )
2001 
2002  imp(i)%cod = impcode(tac(iaci), tac(iacj), tac(iack), tac(iacl))
2003 
2004  if(imp(i)%cod == 0) then
2005  write(*,20) imp(i)%i, imp(i)%j, imp(i)%k, imp(i)%l
2006  end if
2007  enddo
2008 20 format('Atoms of missing improper:',4i5)
2009 
2010 ! --- Make a list of actual angle types to be used
2011 
2012  iused(:) = 0
2013 
2014  nimpcod = 0
2015 
2016  do i = 1, nimps
2017 ! workaround to permit missing param's
2018  if(imp(i)%cod /=0) then
2019  if(iused(imp(i)%cod ) ==0) then
2020  iused(imp(i)%cod ) = 1
2021  nimpcod = nimpcod+1
2022  itrans(imp(i)%cod ) = nimpcod
2023  implib(nimpcod) = imp_prm(imp(i)%cod)%prm
2024  imp(i)%cod = nimpcod
2025  ELSE
2026  imp(i)%cod = itrans(imp(i)%cod )
2027  endif
2028  endif
2029  enddo
2030 
2031  write(*, 100) nimps_solute, 'solute'
2032  write(*, 100) nimps-nimps_solute, 'solvent'
2033 100 format('Made ',i6,1x,a,' impropers.')
2034 !.......................................................................
2035 end subroutine imp_params

2039 integer function find_atom(ires, atom)
2040 !arguments
2041  integer :: ires
2042  character(len=5) :: atom
2043 !locals
2044  integer :: my_res, iat, irc
2045  character(len=4) :: my_atom
2046  integer :: mol1, mol2
2047 
2048  if(atom(1:1) == '-') then
2049  my_res = ires - 1
2050  my_atom = atom(2:5)
2051  elseif(atom(1:1) == '+') then
2052  my_res = ires + 1
2053  my_atom = atom(2:5)
2054  else
2055  my_res = ires
2056  my_atom = atom(1:4)
2057  end if
2058 
2059  find_atom = 0
2060 
2061  !first may not refer backwards and last may not refer ahead
2062  if(my_res < 1 .or. my_res > nres) then
2063  !can't move outside terminal residues - skip
2064  return
2065  end if
2066 
2067  !check if moving outside molecule
2068  if(ires /= my_res) then
2069  do mol1 = 1, nmol
2070  if(res(ires)%start < istart_mol(mol1+1)) exit
2071  end do
2072  do mol2 = 1, nmol
2073  if(res(my_res)%start < istart_mol(mol2+1)) exit
2074  end do
2075  if(mol1 /= mol2) return !crossed molecule boundary
2076  end if
2077 
2078  irc = res(my_res)%irc !get residue code
2079 
2080  do iat = 1, lib(irc)%nat
2081  if(lib(irc)%atnam(iat) == my_atom) then
2082  find_atom = res(my_res)%start + iat - 1
2083  exit
2084  end if
2085  end do
2086 
2087  if(ires == my_res .and. find_atom == 0) then
2088  !we have an error: an atom in _this_ residue was not found
2089  topo_ok = .false.
2090  write(*, 120) my_atom, lib(irc)%nam, ires
2091  end if
2092 
2093 120 format('>>>>> ERROR: There is no atom named ',a4,' in residue ',a4,i5,'.')
2094 
2095 end function find_atom
2096

2099 subroutine makeimps_explicit
2100 !generate impropers using definitions in library file
2101 ! *** local variables
2102  integer :: ires, irc, iimp, i
2103 
2104  nimps = 0
2105  nimps_solute = 0
2106 
2107  do ires = 1, nres !loop over residues
2108  irc = res(ires)%irc
2109  do iimp = 1, lib(irc)%nimp !loop over improper defs
2110  nimps = nimps+1
2111  if(ires <= nres_solute) nimps_solute = nimps_solute + 1
2112  imp(nimps)%i = find_atom(ires, lib(irc)%imp(iimp)%i)
2113  imp(nimps)%j = find_atom(ires, lib(irc)%imp(iimp)%j)
2114  imp(nimps)%k = find_atom(ires, lib(irc)%imp(iimp)%k)
2115  imp(nimps)%l = find_atom(ires, lib(irc)%imp(iimp)%l)
2116  if(imp(nimps)%i == 0 .or. imp(nimps)%j == 0 .or. &
2117  imp(nimps)%k == 0 .or. imp(nimps)%l == 0) then
2118  !not found
2119  nimps = nimps - 1 !take a step back, discard this one
2120  if(ires <= nres_solute) nimps_solute = nimps_solute - 1
2121  end if
2122  end do
2123  end do
2124 
2125 end subroutine makeimps_explicit

2129 subroutine maketop
2130 
2131  !check if library is loaded
2132  if(.not. check_residues()) return
2133 
2134 ! bail out if readparm failed
2135  if(.not.ff_ok) then
2136  write(*,900)
2137 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Force field parameters not loaded.')
2138  return
2139  end if
2140  topo_ok = .false.
2141 
2142  !check if boundaries are set
2143 
2144  if(.not. boundary_set) then
2145  write(*,910)
2146 910 format('>>>>> ERROR: Boundary has not been set.')
2147  return
2148  end if
2149 
2150  if( .not. have_solvent_boundary) then
2151  xwcent(:) = xpcent(:)
2152  write(*,911)
2153  write(*,912)
2154 911 format('>>>>> WARNING: System has not been solvated.')
2155 912 format('Using boundary center as solvent center.')
2156  end if
2157 
2158  if(.not. have_title) then
2159  CALL get_line_arg(title, '-----> Give this topology a title: ')
2160  have_title = .true.
2161  end if
2162  topo_ok = .true. !now hope for the best
2163 
2164  !deallocate old topology if any
2165  if(allocated(iac)) deallocate(iac)
2166  if(allocated(crg)) deallocate(crg)

2168  if(allocated(list14)) deallocate(list14)
2169  if(allocated(listex)) deallocate(listex)
2170  if(allocated(nconn)) deallocate(nconn)
2171  if(allocated(iconn)) deallocate(iconn)
2172  if(allocated(bnd)) deallocate(bnd)
2173  if(allocated(bondlib)) deallocate(bondlib)
2174  if(allocated(sybyl_bond_type)) deallocate(sybyl_bond_type)
2175  if(allocated(ang)) deallocate(ang)
2176  if(allocated(anglib)) deallocate(anglib)
2177  if(allocated(tor)) deallocate(tor)
2178  if(allocated(torlib)) deallocate(torlib)
2179  if(allocated(imp)) deallocate(imp)
2180  if(allocated(implib)) deallocate(implib)
2181  if(allocated(list14long)) deallocate(list14long)
2182  if(associated(listexlong)) deallocate(listexlong)
2183  if(allocated(cgp)) deallocate(cgp)
2184  if(allocated(nconn)) deallocate(nconn)
2185  if(allocated(iconn)) deallocate(iconn)
2186  if(allocated(excl)) deallocate(excl)
2187  if(allocated(shell)) deallocate(shell)
2188 
2189  !allocate topology arrays (set max_atom etc
2190  call topo_set_max(nat_pro, max_lib, max_long) !make space for new topology
2191  allocate(iac(max_atom), &
2192  crg(max_atom), &
2193  cgpatom(max_atom), &
2194  list14(max_nbr_range, max_atom), &
2195  listex(max_nbr_range, max_atom), &
2196  nconn(max_atom), iconn(max_conn, max_atom), &
2197  stat=alloc_status)
2198  if(alloc_status /= 0) then
2199  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Out of memory when allocating topology arrays'
2200  stop 255
2201  end if
2202 
2203  if( .not. use_pbc ) then
2204  allocate(excl(max_atom), shell(max_atom), stat=alloc_status)
2205  if(alloc_status /= 0) then
2206  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Out of memory when allocating topology arrays'
2207  stop 255
2208  end if
2209  end if
2210 
2211  allocate(bnd(max_bonds), &
2212  bondlib(max_bondlib), &
2213  sybyl_bond_type(max_bondlib), &
2214  ang(max_angles), &
2215  anglib(max_anglib), &
2216  tor(max_tors), &
2217  torlib(max_torlib), &
2218  imp(max_imps), &
2219  implib(max_implib), &
2220  stat=alloc_status)
2221  if(alloc_status /= 0) then
2222  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Out of memory when allocating topology arrays'
2223  stop 255
2224  end if
2225 
2226  allocate(list14long(2, max_14long), &
2227  listexlong(2, max_exlong), &
2228  cgp(max_cgp), &
2229  stat=alloc_status)
2230  if(alloc_status /= 0) then
2231  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Out of memory when allocating topology arrays'
2232  stop 255
2233  end if
2234 
2235  !set date of creation
2236  call date_and_time(creation_date)
2237 
2238  !set atom types, charges, charge groups
2239  CALL set_iac
2240  if(.not. topo_ok) return
2241 
2242  call set_solvent_type
2243  CALL set_crg
2244  CALL makebonds
2245  call set_bondcodes
2246  call makeconn
2247  CALL makeangles
2248  CALL maketors
2249  if(imp_explicit) then
2250  call makeimps_explicit !explicit (from lib.) generation
2251  else
2252  CALL makeimps !automatic generation
2253  end if
2254  call imp_params !set codes & filter out unused types
2255  CALL make14list
2256  CALL makeexlist
2257  CALL makehyds !generate hydrogens
2258  CALL set_cgp !assigns all cgp() within exclusion radius
2259 
2260  call set_default_mask
2261 
2262 ! Now check if we have missing parameters
2263  if(topo_ok) then
2264  write(*,'(a)') 'Topology successfully generated.'
2265  else
2266  write(*, '(/,a,/)') 'ERROR: There are missing parameters!'
2267  write(*, '(a)') 'You need to add parameters and do readprm + maketop again.'
2268  write(*, 100) trim(prm_file)
2269  endif
2270  100 format('parameter file: ', a)
2271 end subroutine maketop

2326  do jc = 1, nconn(bnd(ib)%j )

2329 
2330  if(i/=j) then
2331

2359 ! tor(ntors)%i = tor(ntors - 1)%i
2360 ! tor(ntors)%j = tor(ntors - 1)%j
2361 ! tor(ntors)%k = tor(ntors - 1)%k
2362 ! tor(ntors)%l = tor(ntors - 1)%l
2363 ! tor(ntors)%cod = tor(ntors - 1)%cod + 1
2364 ! more_terms = .false.

2366 ! more_terms = .true.

2370  endif
2371 
2372  endif
2373  enddo
2374  endif

2376

2378

2380

2382

2384

2386 ! workaround to permit missing param's
2387  if(tor(i)%cod /=0) then
2388  if(iused(tor(i)%cod ) ==0) then
2389  iused(tor(i)%cod ) = 1
2390  ntorcod = ntorcod+1

2393  tor(i)%cod = ntorcod
2394  ELSE
2395  tor(i)%cod = itrans(tor(i)%cod)
2396  endif
2397  endif
2398  enddo
2399 
2400  write(*, 100) ntors_solute, 'solute'
2401  write(*, 100) ntors-ntors_solute, 'solvent'
2402 100 format('Made ',i6,1x,a,' torsions.')
2403 !.......................................................................
2404 end subroutine maketors

2420 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2421 
2422 real FUNCTION randm(seed, seed_only)
2423 !arguments
2424  integer, intent(in), optional:: seed
2425  logical, intent(in), optional:: seed_only
2426 ! *** Local variables
2427  integer, parameter :: m = 100000000, m1 = 10000, mult = 31415821
2428  integer, save :: irand = 0
2429  integer :: irandh, irandl, multh, multl
2430  real :: r
2431 
2432  if(present(seed)) then
2433  irand = mod(iabs(seed), m)
2434  end if
2435  if(present(seed_only)) return
2436 !
2437 ! --- multiply irand by mult, but take into account that overflow must
2438 ! --- be discarded, and do not generate an error.
2439 !
2440  irandh = irand / m1
2441  irandl = mod(irand, m1)
2442  multh = mult / m1
2443  multl = mod(mult, m1)
2444 !
2445  irand = mod(irandh * multl + irandl * multh, m1) * m1 + irandl * &
2446  multl
2447  irand = mod(irand+1, m)
2448 !
2449 ! --- convert irand to a real random number between 0 and 1.
2450 !
2451  r = real(irand / 10) * 10 / real(m)
2452  if((r<=0.e0) .or.(r>1.e0) ) r = 0.e0
2453  randm = r
2454 
2455 !.......................................................................
2456 end FUNCTION randm

2458 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2459 
2460 subroutine oldreadlib(filnam)
2461 !arguments
2462  character(*) :: filnam
2463 ! *** local variables
2464  CHARACTER :: line*80
2465  integer :: irec, i, iat, ires, j, igp, ntot
2466  real :: qtot, qgrp, qtot_grp
2467 
2468  !some extra arrays used only for allocation. This circumvents
2469  !an unaligned access error on Digitail UNIX 4.0 / Digital FORTRAN
2470  !(Compiler bug?)
2471 
2472  character(len=KEYLENGTH), pointer:: tac_lib(:)
2473  character(len=4), pointer :: atnam(:)
2474  real, pointer :: crg_lib(:)
2475  integer(AI), pointer :: natcgp(:), switch(:)
2476  integer(AI), pointer :: atcgp(:,:)
2477  type(lib_bond_type), pointer::bnd(:)
2478  integer :: stat
2479 
2480 1 format(a,t7,a,t14,a,t21,a,t28,a)
2481 2 format(a4)
2482 3 format(t9,i3)
2483 4 format(t14,f5.2)
2484 5 format(t23,i3)
2485 6 format(t31,i3)
2486 !.......................................................................
2487 
2488  if(openit(1, filnam, 'old', 'formatted', 'read') /= 0) then
2489  write(*, '(a,a)') '>>>>>ERROR: Could not open library file ', &
2490  trim(filnam)
2491  return
2492  end if
2493 
2494  write( * , '(/,a,a,/)') 'Reading molecular library ',trim(filnam)
2495  write(*,1) 'name', 'atoms','net Q', 'bonds', 'Q-grps'
2496  do irec = 1, 99999
2497  call skip_comments(1)
2498  READ(1, '(a80)') line
2499  if(line=='end') exit
2500  backspace(1)
2501  nlibres = nlibres + 1
2502  if(nlibres > max_entry) then
2503  write(*,*) 'ERROR: Too many library entries!'
2504  write(*,*) '(This problem may be solved by increasing max_entry.)'
2505  exit
2506  end if
2507  ires = nlibres
2508 
2509 ! --- Read entry name
2510 
2511  lib(nlibres)%SYBYLTYPE = '****'
2512  lib(nlibres)%HETATM =.false. !don't use new feature
2513  lib(nlibres)%solvent =.false. !don't use new feature
2514  lib(nlibres)%density =0 !don't use new feature
2515  read(1, '(a)') line
2516  READ(line, fmt=*, err=9, end=9) lib(nlibres)%nam, lib(nlibres)%SYBYLTYPE
2517 9 write( *, 2, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nam
2518 ! --- Read no. of atoms, at. no., name, iac, charge
2519 
2520  READ(1, * , iostat=stat) lib(nlibres)%nat
2521  if (stat /= 0) then
2522  write(*,*)
2523  write(*,*) 'Incorrect input!'
2524  return
2525  endif
2526  write(*,3, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nat
2527 
2528  allocate(atnam(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2529  lib(nlibres)%atnam => atnam
2530 
2531  allocate(tac_lib(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2532  lib(nlibres)%tac_lib => tac_lib
2533 
2534  allocate(crg_lib(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2535  lib(nlibres)%crg_lib => crg_lib
2536 
2537  qtot = 0
2538  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nat
2539  READ(1, *) iat, lib(nlibres)%atnam(iat), lib(nlibres)%tac_lib(iat), &
2540  lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(iat)
2541  qtot = qtot + lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(iat)
2542  enddo
2543  write(*, 4, advance='no') qtot
2544 ! --- Read no. of bonds, bond list, tail/head connections
2545 
2546  READ(1, * ) lib(nlibres)%nbnd
2547  allocate(bnd(lib(nlibres)%nbnd), stat=alloc_status)
2548  lib(nlibres)%bnd => bnd
2549  write(*, 5, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nbnd
2550  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nbnd
2551  READ(1, * ) lib(nlibres)%bnd(i)%i, lib(nlibres)%bnd(i)%j
2552  enddo
2553 
2554  READ(1, * ) lib(nlibres)%head, lib(nlibres)%tail
2555 
2556 ! --- Read charge group info
2557 
2558  READ(1, * ) lib(nlibres)%ncgp
2559  write(*, 6) lib(nlibres)%ncgp
2560  allocate(atcgp(max(max_atcgplib, lib(nlibres)%nat), lib(nlibres)%ncgp))
2561  lib(nlibres)%atcgp => atcgp
2562  allocate(natcgp(lib(nlibres)%ncgp), switch(lib(nlibres)%ncgp))
2563 
2564  lib(nlibres)%natcgp => natcgp
2565  lib(nlibres)%switch => switch
2566 
2567  qtot_grp = 0.
2568  ntot = 0
2569  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%ncgp
2570  READ(1, * ) lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i), lib(nlibres)%switch(i)
2571  ntot = ntot + lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i)
2572  READ(1, * )lib(nlibres)%atcgp(1:lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i), i)
2573  qgrp = 0
2574  do j = 1, lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i)
2575  !The Cray compiler doesn't like lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(lib(nlibres)%atcgp(j, i))
2576  igp = lib(nlibres)%atcgp(j, i)
2577  qgrp = qgrp + lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(igp)
2578  enddo
2579  !check fractional charges
2580  if(abs(qgrp - nint(qgrp) ) >0.000001) then
2581  write( *, 130) qgrp, i
2582  end if
2583  qtot_grp = qtot_grp + qgrp
2584  enddo
2585  !check total charge & atom count consistency
2586  if(ntot /= lib(nlibres)%nat) then
2587  write(*, 150)
2588  endif
2589  if(abs(qtot - qtot_grp) >0.000001) then
2590  write(*,160)
2591  end if
2592  enddo
2593  close(1)
2594 
2595  write( *, 110) nlibres
2596 
2597 110 format(/,'Accumulated no. of library entries loaded =',i4,/)
2598 
2599 130 format('>>> Warning: fractional charge = ',f8.5, ' on group no.',i3)
2600 150 format('>>> ERROR: charge group atom count does not match total atom count!')
2601 160 format('>>> ERROR: Sum of charge group charges not equal to sum of all charges!')
2602 
2603 end subroutine oldreadlib
2604 
2605 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2606 
2607 subroutine readlib(file)
2608 !arguments
2609  character(*), optional :: file
2610 ! *** local variables
2611  CHARACTER :: line*80, filnam*80
2612  integer :: irec, i, iat, ires, j, igp, ntot
2613  real :: qtot, qgrp, qtot_grp
2614  character(len=80) :: resnam
2615  integer :: res_count
2616  logical :: prm_res
2617  integer :: cgp_read(max_atcgplib)
2618 
2619  !some extra arrays used only for allocation. This circumvents
2620  !an unaligned access error on Digital UNIX 4.0 / Digital FORTRAN
2621  !(Compiler bug?)
2622 
2623  character(len=KEYLENGTH), pointer:: tac_lib(:)
2624  character(len=4), pointer :: atnam(:)
2625  real, pointer :: crg_lib(:)
2626  integer(AI), pointer :: natcgp(:), switch(:)
2627  integer(AI), pointer :: atcgp(:,:)
2628  type(lib_bond_type), pointer:: bnd(:)
2629  type(lib_imp_type), pointer :: imp(:)
2630  logical :: lib_exists
2631  character(len=8) :: atnam1, atnam2, atnam3, atnam4
2632  integer :: atno1, atno2, atno3, atno4
2633  logical :: yes
2634  integer :: atoms_in_rule, readstat
2635 
2636 1 format(10a7)
2637 2 format(a4)
2638 3 format(i7)
2639 4 format(f7.2)
2640 7 format(4x,a)
2641 !.......................................................................
2642 
2643  res_count = 0
2644  if(present(file)) then
2645  filnam = file
2646  else
2647  call get_string_arg(filnam, '-----> Name of molecular library: ')
2648  end if
2649  inquire(file=filnam, exist=lib_exists)
2650  if(.not. lib_exists) then
2651  write(*,10) trim(filnam)
2652  return
2653  end if
2654 
2655  if(lib_files == '') then
2656  lib_files = filnam
2657  elseif(len_trim(lib_files) < 200-len_trim(filnam)) then
2658  lib_files = trim(lib_files) // ";" // trim(filnam)
2659  end if
2660 
2661  if(.not. prm_open(filnam)) then
2662  !if reading fails try old format
2663  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>>WARNING: Attempting to read old-style library file.'
2664  call oldreadlib(filnam)
2665  return
2666  end if
2667 
2668 10 format('>>>>> ERROR: ',a,' does not exist.')
2669 
2670  write( * , '(/,a,a,/)') 'Reading molecular library ',trim(filnam)
2671  write(*,2, advance='no') 'name'
2672  write(*,1) 'atoms','net Q', 'bonds', 'rules', 'imps', 'Q-grps'
2673  !loop over all titles in file
2674  do while(prm_get_next_title(resnam))
2675  call check_overload(resnam)
2676  nlibres = nlibres + 1
2677  res_count = res_count + 1
2678  lib(nlibres)%nam = resnam(1:len(lib(nlibres)%nam)) !copy name
2679  write( *, 2, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nam
2680  lib(nlibres)%SYBYLTYPE = '****'
2681  lib(nlibres)%HETATM = .false.
2682  lib(nlibres)%solvent = .false.
2683  if(prm_open_section('info')) then !read info
2684  if(prm_get_string_by_key('SYBYLTYPE', line)) then
2685  lib(nlibres)%SYBYLTYPE = line(1:len(lib(nlibres)%SYBYLTYPE))
2686  end if
2687  yes=prm_get_string_by_key('PDBTYPE', line, 'ATOM')
2688  call upcase(line)
2689  if(trim(line) == 'HETATM') then
2690  lib(nlibres)%HETATM = .true.
2691  elseif(trim(line) /= 'ATOM') then
2692  write(*,'(a,a)') '>>>>>WARNING: Unknown PBBtype ',trim(line)
2693  end if
2694  yes=prm_get_logical_by_key('solvent',lib(nlibres)%solvent,.false.)
2695  if(lib(nlibres)%solvent) then
2696  solvent_names = trim(solvent_names)//lib(nlibres)%nam//','
2697  end if
2698  yes=prm_get_real_by_key('density',lib(nlibres)%density,0.)
2699  end if
2700 
2701 ! --- Read no. of atoms, at. no., name, iac, charge
2702  lib(nlibres)%nat = prm_count('atoms')
2703  if(lib(nlibres)%nat == 0) then
2704  write(*,'(a,a)') '>>>>>ERROR: No atoms in residue ',trim(resnam)
2705  !undo this residue
2706  nlibres = nlibres - 1
2707  res_count = res_count - 1
2708  exit
2709  end if
2710 
2711  write(*,3, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nat
2712 
2713  allocate(atnam(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2714 
2715  !initialise atom name -> number index
2716  call index_create(lib(nlibres)%nat)
2717 
2718  lib(nlibres)%atnam => atnam
2719 
2720  allocate(tac_lib(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2721  lib(nlibres)%tac_lib => tac_lib
2722 
2723  allocate(crg_lib(lib(nlibres)%nat))
2724  lib(nlibres)%crg_lib => crg_lib
2725 
2726  qtot = 0
2727  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nat
2728  prm_res = prm_get_line(line)
2729  READ(line, *) iat
2730  !Check numbering of atoms
2731  if (iat>lib(nlibres)%nat) then
2732  write(*,119) iat
2733  end if
2734  READ(line, *) iat, lib(nlibres)%atnam(iat), lib(nlibres)%tac_lib(iat), &
2735  lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(iat)
2736  if(.not. index_add(lib(nlibres)%atnam(iat), iat)) then
2737  !could not add - name duplication?
2738  write(*, 120) iat, lib(nlibres)%atnam(iat)
2739  end if
2740  !add also the number as an atom name
2741  write(atnam1,'(i4)') iat
2742  atnam1 = adjustl(atnam1)
2743  if(.not. index_add(atnam1, iat)) then
2744  !could not add - number duplication?
2745  write(*, 121) iat
2746  end if
2747 
2748  qtot = qtot + lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(iat)
2749  enddo
2750  write(*, 4, advance='no') qtot
2751 
2752 ! --- Read bond list
2753  lib(nlibres)%nbnd = prm_count('bonds')
2754  allocate(bnd(lib(nlibres)%nbnd), stat=alloc_status)
2755  lib(nlibres)%bnd => bnd
2756 
2757  write(*, 3, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nbnd
2758  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nbnd
2759  prm_res = prm_get_line(line)
2760  read(line, *) atnam1, atnam2
2761  if(.not. index_get(atnam1, atno1)) then
2762  write(*,125) atnam1, i
2763  cycle
2764  end if
2765  if(.not. index_get(atnam2, atno2)) then
2766  write(*,126) atnam2, i
2767  cycle
2768  end if
2769  lib(nlibres)%bnd(i)%i = atno1
2770  lib(nlibres)%bnd(i)%j = atno2
2771  enddo
2772 
2773  !read head and tail connections, if present
2774  lib(nlibres)%head = 0
2775  lib(nlibres)%tail = 0
2776  if(prm_open_section('connections')) then
2777  !0 is returned if not found
2778  atno1 = 0
2779  if(prm_get_string_by_key('head', atnam1)) then
2780  if(atnam1 /= '0' .and. .not. index_get(atnam1, atno1)) then
2781  write(*,127) atnam1
2782  end if
2783  end if
2784  lib(nlibres)%head = atno1
2785  atno1 = 0
2786  if(prm_get_string_by_key('tail', atnam1)) then
2787  if(atnam1 /= '0' .and. .not. index_get(atnam1, atno1)) then
2788  write(*,128) atnam1
2789  end if
2790  end if
2791  lib(nlibres)%tail = atno1
2792  end if
2793 
2794 ! --- Read hydrogen build rules
2795  lib(nlibres)%nrules = prm_count('build_rules')
2796  allocate(lib(nlibres)%rules(lib(nlibres)%nrules))
2797 
2798  write(*, 3, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nrules
2799 ruleloop: do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nrules
2800  !read kind
2801  prm_res = prm_get_field(line)
2802  call locase(line)
2803  if(line == 'torsion') then
2804  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = build_rule_torsion
2805  atoms_in_rule = 4
2806  else
2807  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = 0
2808  write(*, 200) i, trim(line)
2809 200 format('>>>>> ERROR: Unrecognised rule',i2,' kind ',a)
2810  !skip to end of line
2811  yes = prm_get_field(line, skip=.true.)
2812  !continue to next rule
2813  cycle ruleloop
2814  end if
2815  do iat = 1, atoms_in_rule
2816  if(.not. prm_get_field(line)) then
2817  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = 0
2818  write(*, 210) i
2819 210 format('>>>>> ERROR: Read error at rule',i2)
2820  yes = prm_get_field(line, skip=.true.)
2821  !continue to next rule
2822  cycle ruleloop
2823  end if
2824  if(.not. index_get(line, lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%atom(iat))) then
2825  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = 0
2826  write(*, 220) trim(line), i
2827 220 format('>>>>> ERROR: Atom ',a,' not found in rule',i2)
2828  yes = prm_get_field(line, skip=.true.)
2829  !continue to next rule
2830  cycle ruleloop
2831  end if
2832  end do
2833  if(.not. prm_get_field(line)) then
2834  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = 0
2835  write(*, 230) i
2836 230 format('>>>>> ERROR: No value for rule ',i2)
2837  yes = prm_get_field(line, skip=.true.)
2838  cycle ruleloop
2839  end if
2840  read(line, *, iostat=readstat) lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%value
2841  if(readstat /= 0) then
2842  lib(nlibres)%rules(i)%kind = 0
2843  write(*, 240) trim(line), i
2844 240 format('>>>>> ERROR: Read error at rule ',i2)
2845  end if
2846  yes = prm_get_field(line, skip=.true.)
2847  end do ruleloop
2848 
2849 
2850 ! --- Read improper list
2851  lib(nlibres)%nimp = prm_count('impropers')
2852  allocate(imp(lib(nlibres)%nimp), stat=alloc_status)
2853  lib(nlibres)%imp => imp
2854 
2855  write(*, 3, advance='no') lib(nlibres)%nimp
2856  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nimp
2857  prm_res = prm_get_line(line)
2858  !note the order j,i,l,k used to conform with amber and charmm
2859  !parameter file conventions
2860  READ(line, * ) lib(nlibres)%imp(i)%i, lib(nlibres)%imp(i)%j, &
2861  lib(nlibres)%imp(i)%k, lib(nlibres)%imp(i)%l
2862  enddo
2863 
2864 ! --- Read charge group info
2865  lib(nlibres)%ncgp = prm_count('charge_groups')
2866  !if no chargegroups construct one
2867  if(lib(nlibres)%ncgp == 0) then
2868  write(*,7) 'none, creating default'
2869  lib(nlibres)%ncgp = 1
2870  allocate(atcgp(max(max_atcgplib, lib(nlibres)%nat), 1))
2871  lib(nlibres)%atcgp => atcgp
2872  allocate(natcgp(1), switch(1))
2873 
2874  lib(nlibres)%natcgp => natcgp
2875  lib(nlibres)%switch => switch
2876 
2877  !create a charge group with all atoms
2878  lib(nlibres)%switch(1) = 1
2879  lib(nlibres)%natcgp(1) = lib(nlibres)%nat
2880  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%nat
2881  lib(nlibres)%atcgp(i,1) = i
2882  end do
2883  !pass consistencty test below
2884  qtot_grp = qtot
2885  ntot = lib(nlibres)%nat
2886  else
2887  write(*, 3) lib(nlibres)%ncgp
2888  allocate(atcgp(max(max_atcgplib, lib(nlibres)%nat), lib(nlibres)%ncgp))
2889  lib(nlibres)%atcgp => atcgp
2890  allocate(natcgp(lib(nlibres)%ncgp), switch(lib(nlibres)%ncgp))
2891 
2892  lib(nlibres)%natcgp => natcgp
2893  lib(nlibres)%switch => switch
2894 
2895  qtot_grp = 0.
2896  ntot = 0
2897  do i = 1, lib(nlibres)%ncgp
2898  qgrp = 0.
2899  lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i) = 0
2900  do while(prm_get_field(line)) !get one number at a time
2901  if(.not. index_get(line, igp)) then
2902  write(*,131) lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i) + 1, trim(line), i
2903  cycle
2904  end if
2905  !read(line, *) igp
2906  qgrp = qgrp + lib(nlibres)%crg_lib(igp)
2907  lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i) = lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i) + 1
2908  lib(nlibres)%atcgp(lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i),i) = igp
2909  end do
2910  lib(nlibres)%switch(i) = lib(nlibres)%atcgp(1,i)
2911  ntot = ntot + lib(nlibres)%natcgp(i)
2912 
2913  !check fractional charges
2914  if(abs(qgrp - nint(qgrp) ) >0.000001) then
2915  write( *, 130) qgrp, i
2916  end if
2917  qtot_grp = qtot_grp + qgrp
2918  enddo !charge groups
2919  end if !charge groups defined
2920 
2921  !check total charge & atom count consistency
2922  if(ntot /= lib(nlibres)%nat) then
2923  write(*, 150)
2924  endif
2925  if(abs(qtot - qtot_grp) >0.000001) then
2926  write(*,160)
2927  end if
2928  end do !entries
2929 
2930  call prm_close
2931 
2932 
2933  write( *, 110) nlibres
2934 
2935 110 FORMAT(/,'Accumulated no. of library entries loaded =',i4,/)
2936 119 format('>>> ERROR: Atom',i3,' has erraneos atom number.')
2937 120 format('>>> ERROR: Atom',i3,' has duplicated or invalid name ',a)
2938 121 format('>>> ERROR: Atom',i3,' has duplicated or invalid number.')
2939 125 format('>>> ERROR: First atom named ',a,' in bond ',i3,' not found')
2940 126 format('>>> ERROR: Second atom named ',a,' in bond ',i3,' not found')
2941 127 format('>>> ERROR: Head atom named ',a,' not found')
2942 128 format('>>> ERROR: Tail atom named ',a,' not found')
2943 130 format('>>> Warning: fractional charge = ',f8.5, ' on group no.',i3)
2944 131 format('>>>>> ERROR: Atom',i3,' named ',a,' of charge group',i3,' not found.')
2945 150 format('>>> ERROR: charge group atom count does not match total atom count!')
2946 160 format('>>> ERROR: Sum of charge group charges not equal to sum of all charges!')
2947 
2948 end subroutine readlib

2952 subroutine check_overload(resnam)
2953  ! arguments
2954  character(len=80) :: resnam
2955  !locals
2956  integer :: i
2957 
2958  do i = 1, nlibres
2959  if(lib(i)%nam == resnam) then
2960  write(*,100) trim(resnam)
2961 100 format('>>> WARNING: Overloading old definition of ',a)
2962  lib(i)%nam = 'gone'
2963  exit
2964  end if
2965  end do
2966 end subroutine check_overload

2970 subroutine oldreadparm(flag)
2971 ! arguments
2972  LOGICAL flag
2973 ! *** local variables
2974  integer i, ityp, filestat
2975  character(200) :: line
2976  character(len=KEYLENGTH) :: taci, tacj, tack, tacl
2977  integer :: iaci, iacj, iack, iacl
2978 !.......................................................................
2979 
2980  !set default values for options which are not available in old param. file
2981  iuse_switch_atom = 1 !this is the default. It can be overridden
2982  !in old libraries by setting switch atoms to 0
2983  !new parameter files have the keyword switch_atoms (sec. options)
2984  !to control this
2985  coulomb_constant = 332.0
2986  imp_explicit = .false.
2987  imp_type = 1 !harmonic impropers
2988  ff_type = ff_gromos
2989 
2990  flag = .true.
2991  CALL skip_comments(2)
2992 
2993  i = 0
2994  READ(2, *, err = 1000) nbnd_prm
2995  CALL skip_comments(2)
2996  if(allocated(bnd_prm)) deallocate(bnd_prm)
2997  if(allocated(bnd_types)) deallocate(bnd_types)
2998  allocate(bnd_prm(nbnd_prm), stat=alloc_status)
2999  allocate(bnd_types(nbnd_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3000  call check_alloc('bond parameters')
3001  do i = 1, nbnd_prm
3002  READ(2, *, err = 1000) iaci, iacj, bnd_prm(i)%prm%fk, bnd_prm(i)%prm%bnd0
3003  bnd_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3004  bnd_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3005  bnd_prm(i)%SYBYLtype = '1 ' !set to default
3006  enddo
3007  write( * , 110) nbnd_prm, 'bond types'
3008  CALL skip_comments(2)
3009  i = 0
3010  READ(2, *, err = 1010) nang_prm
3011  CALL skip_comments(2)
3012  if(allocated(ang_prm)) deallocate(ang_prm)
3013  allocate(ang_prm(nang_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3014  if(allocated(ang_types)) deallocate(ang_types)
3015  allocate(ang_types(nang_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3016  call check_alloc('angle parameters')
3017  !set optional parameters to 0.
3018  ang_prm(:)%ureyfk = 0.
3019  ang_prm(:)%ureyr0 = 0.
3020  do i = 1, nang_prm
3021  read(2, '(a80)', err=1010) line
3022  read(line, *, iostat=filestat) iaci, iacj, iack, ang_prm(i)
3023  ang_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3024  ang_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3025  ang_types(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3026  !accept missing parameters but not read error
3027  if(filestat > 0) goto 1010
3028  enddo
3029  write( * , 110) nang_prm, 'angle types'
3030 
3031  CALL skip_comments(2)
3032  i = 0
3033  READ(2, *, err = 1020) ntor_prm
3034  CALL skip_comments(2)
3035  if(allocated(tor_prm)) deallocate(tor_prm)
3036  allocate(tor_prm(ntor_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3037  if(allocated(tor_types)) deallocate(tor_types)
3038  allocate(tor_types(ntor_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3039  call check_alloc('torsion parameters')
3040  do i = 1, ntor_prm
3041  READ(2, *, err = 1020) iaci, iacj, iack, iacl, tor_prm(i)
3042  tor_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3043  tor_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3044  tor_types(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3045  tor_types(i)%tacl = tac(iacl)
3046  enddo
3047  write(*, 110) ntor_prm, 'torsion types'
3048 
3049  CALL skip_comments(2)
3050  i = 0
3051  READ(2, *, err = 1030) nimp_prm
3052  CALL skip_comments(2)
3053  if(allocated(imp_prm)) deallocate(imp_prm)
3054  allocate(imp_prm(nimp_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3055  call check_alloc('improper parameters')
3056  do i = 1, nimp_prm
3057  READ(2, *, err = 1030) iacj, iack, imp_prm(i)%prm
3058  imp_prm(i)%taci = '' !not used
3059  imp_prm(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3060  imp_prm(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3061  imp_prm(i)%tacl = '' !not used
3062  enddo
3063  write( * , 110) nimp_prm, 'improper types'
3064 
3065  CALL skip_comments(2)
3066  i = 0
3067  READ(2, *, err = 1040) natyps
3068 
3069  READ(2, *, err = 1040) ivdw_rule
3070  READ(2, *, err = 1040) el14_scale
3071  CALL skip_comments(2)
3072 
3073  !if no PDB file read (blank topology)
3074  if(allocated(iaclib)) deallocate(iaclib)
3075  max_atyps = max_old_atyps
3076  allocate(iaclib(max_atyps))
3077  if(allocated(sybyl_atom_type)) deallocate(sybyl_atom_type)
3078  allocate(sybyl_atom_type(max_atyps))
3079  if(allocated(tac)) deallocate(tac)
3080  allocate(tac(max_atyps))
3081  !clear atom type parameters
3082  do i=1,max_atyps
3083  iaclib(i)%avdw(:) = 0.
3084  iaclib(i)%bvdw(:) = 0.
3085  iaclib(i)%mass = 0.
3086  sybyl_atom_type(i) = ' '
3087  tac(i) = ''
3088  end do
3089 
3090  call index_create(natyps)
3091  do i = 1, natyps
3092  READ(2, *, err = 1040) ityp, iaclib(ityp)%avdw(1), iaclib(ityp)%avdw(2), &
3093  iaclib(ityp)%bvdw(1), iaclib(ityp)%avdw(3), iaclib(ityp)%bvdw(3), &
3094  iaclib(ityp)%mass
3095  iaclib(ityp)%bvdw(2) = iaclib(ityp)%bvdw(1)
3096  write(taci,'(i4)') ityp
3097  tac(ityp) = adjustl(taci)
3098  if(.not. index_add(tac(ityp), ityp)) then
3099  write(*,130) tac(i)
3100  end if
3101  enddo
3102  write( * , 110) natyps, 'atom types'
3103 
3104  CALL skip_comments(2)
3105  i = 0
3106  READ(2, *, err = 1050) nlj2
3107  CALL skip_comments(2)
3108  if(allocated(lj2)) deallocate(lj2)
3109  allocate(lj2(nlj2))
3110  do i = 1, nlj2
3111  READ(2, *, err = 1050) lj2(i)%i, lj2(i)%j
3112  enddo
3113  write( * , 110) nlj2, 'LJ type 2 pairs'
3114 
3115  write( * , '(a,/)') 'Force field parameters successfully read.'
3116  return
3117 
3118  110 format ('Read ',i4,' ', a)
3119  120 format ('>>> ERROR: Failed to read ',a,' number ',i4)
3120  130 format ('>>> ERROR: Could not enumerate atom type ',a, '. Duplicate name?')
3121 
3122  1000 write( * , 120) 'bond type', i
3123  flag = .false.
3124  return
3125 
3126  1010 write( * , 120) 'angle type', i
3127  flag = .false.
3128  return
3129 
3130  1020 write( * , 120) 'torsion type', i
3131  flag = .false.
3132  return
3133 
3134  1030 write( * , 120) 'improper type', i
3135  flag = .false.
3136  return
3137 
3138  1040 write( * , 120) 'atom type', i
3139  flag = .false.
3140  return
3141 
3142  1050 write( * , 120) 'LJ type 2 pair', i
3143  flag = .false.
3144  return
3145 !.......................................................................
3146 end subroutine oldreadparm
