3148 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3149 
3150 subroutine readff
3151  !read parameters
3152  if(.not.have_prm_file_name) then
3153  call get_string_arg(prm_file, '-----> Name of FF parameter file: ')
3154  have_prm_file_name = .true.
3155  endif
3156  inquire(file=prm_file, exist=have_prm_file_name)
3157  if(.not. have_prm_file_name) then
3158  write(*,10) trim(prm_file)
3159  return
3160  end if
3161 10 format('>>>>> ERROR: ',a,' does not exist.')
3162  if(.not. prm_open(prm_file)) then
3163  !if reading fails try old format
3164  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>>WARNING: Attempting to read old-style parameter file.'
3165  if(openit(2, prm_file, 'old', 'formatted', 'read') /= 0) return
3166  CALL oldreadparm(ff_ok)
3167  close(2)
3168  else
3169  call readparm(prm_file) !this will set global flag topo_ok
3170  call prm_close
3171  end if
3172 end subroutine readff
3173 
3174 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3175 
3176 subroutine readparm(filnam)
3177 ! arguments
3178  character(*) :: filnam
3179 
3180 ! *** local variables
3181  integer :: i, ityp, j
3182  character(len=200) :: line, restofline
3183  real :: rdummy
3184  logical :: ldummy
3185  character(len=KEYLENGTH) :: taci, tacj, tack, tacl
3186  integer :: iaci, iacj, iack, iacl
3187  character(len=80) :: section
3188  logical :: sybyl_warn = .false.
3189  integer :: naliases
3190  type(bond_prm_type) :: bnd_prm_tmp
3191  type(anglib_type) :: ang_prm_tmp
3192  type(torlib_type) :: tor_prm_tmp
3193 !.......................................................................
3194  ff_ok = .false.
3195 
3196  write(*,10)
3197 10 format(/,'Reading force field parameter file.')
3198 !parameter file is opened by maketop
3199  if(.not. prm_open_section('options')) then
3200  write(*,*) '>>> WARNING: Options section not found in parameter file.'
3201  write(*,*) ' Trying to read old style parameter file:'
3202  call prm_close()
3203  if(openit(2, filnam, 'old', 'formatted', 'read') /= 0) return
3204  CALL oldreadparm(ff_ok)
3205  close(2)
3206  return
3207  end if
3208 
3209  if(prm_get_string_by_key('name', forcefield)) then
3210  write(*, 20) trim(forcefield)
3211  end if
3212 20 format('Forcefield name:',t32,a)
3213 
3214  if(.not. prm_get_string_by_key('type', line)) then
3215  !also accept the keyword force_field for the same purpose
3216  ldummy = prm_get_string_by_key('force_field', line, 'GROMOS')
3217  end if
3218  call upcase(line)
3219  write(*, 22) trim(line)
3220  select case (line)
3221  case('GROMOS')
3222  ff_type = ff_gromos
3223  case('AMBER')
3224  ff_type = ff_amber
3225  case('CHARMM')
3226  ff_type = ff_charmm
3227  case default
3228  write(*,24)
3229  return
3230  end select
3231 
3232 22 format('Forcefield type:',t32,a)
3233 24 format('>>>>> ERROR: forcefield type must be one of GROMOS, AMBER, CHARMM')
3234 
3235  if(.not. prm_get_string_by_key('vdw_rule', line)) then
3236  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: vdw_rule in options section not found in parameter file.'
3237  return
3238  end if
3239 
3240  call upcase(line)
3241  write(*,30) trim(line)
3242 30 format('Lennard-Jones combination rule:',t32,a)
3243 
3244  if(line(1:9) == 'GEOMETRIC') then
3245  ivdw_rule = 1
3246  else if(line(1:10) == 'ARITHMETIC') then
3247  ivdw_rule = 2
3248  else
3249  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: vdw_rule must be geometric or arithmetic.'
3250  return
3251  end if
3252 
3253  if(.not. prm_get_real_by_key('scale_14', rdummy)) then
3254  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: scale_14 in options section not found in parameter file.'
3255  return
3256  end if
3257  el14_scale = real(rdummy,8)
3258  write(*,40) el14_scale
3259 40 format('Scaling of 1-4 electrostatics:',t31,f6.3)
3260 
3261  if(prm_get_logical_by_key('switch_atoms', ldummy)) then
3262  if(ldummy) then
3263  iuse_switch_atom = 1
3264  write(*,50) 'switching atoms'
3265  else
3266  iuse_switch_atom = 0
3267  write(*,50) 'any atoms'
3268  end if
3269  else
3270  iuse_switch_atom = 1 !default
3271  write(*,50) 'switching atoms'
3272  end if
3273 50 format('Cut-off rule:',t32,a)
3274 
3275  !read improper potential type (harmonic (default) or periodic)
3276  ldummy = prm_get_string_by_key('improper_potential', line, 'HARMONIC')
3277  call upcase(line)
3278  write(*,60) trim(line)
3279 60 format('Improper potential:',t32,a)
3280 
3281  if(line == 'HARMONIC') then
3282  imp_type = 1
3283  else if(line == 'PERIODIC') then
3284  imp_type = 2
3285  else
3286  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: improper_potential must be harmonic or periodic.'
3287  return
3288  end if
3289 
3290  !read improper definition scheme (automatic (default) or explicit)
3291  ldummy = prm_get_string_by_key('improper_definition', line, 'AUTOMATIC')
3292  call upcase(line)
3293  write(*,70) trim(line)
3294 70 format('Improper generation:',t32,a)
3295  if(line == 'AUTOMATIC') then
3296  imp_explicit = .false.
3297  else if(line == 'EXPLICIT') then
3298  imp_explicit = .true.
3299  else
3300  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: improper_definition must be automatic or explicit.'
3301  return
3302  end if
3303 
3304  if(.not. prm_get_real_by_key('coulomb_constant', rdummy)) then
3305  write(*,*) 'Coulomb constant is set to the default value of 332.'
3306  coulomb_constant = 332.0
3307  else
3308  coulomb_constant = real(rdummy,8)
3309  write(*,80) coulomb_constant
3310  end if
3311 80 format('Coulomb constant:',t32,f8.4)
3312 
3313  section = 'atom_types'
3314  natyps = prm_count(section)
3315  if(natyps == 0) then
3316  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: No atom_types defined.'
3317  return
3318  end if
3319  !if no PDB file read (blank topology)
3320  if(allocated(iaclib)) deallocate(iaclib)
3321  allocate(iaclib(natyps))
3322  if(allocated(sybyl_atom_type)) deallocate(sybyl_atom_type)
3323  allocate(sybyl_atom_type(natyps))
3324  if(allocated(tac)) deallocate(tac)
3325  allocate(tac(natyps))
3326  !clear atom type parameters
3327  do i=1,natyps
3328  iaclib(i)%avdw(:) = 0.
3329  iaclib(i)%bvdw(:) = 0.
3330  iaclib(i)%mass = 0.
3331  sybyl_atom_type(i) = ' '
3332  tac(i) = ''
3333  end do
3334  !change number of atom types in topology
3335  max_atyps = natyps
3336 
3337  !initialize atom type lookup table
3338  call index_create(natyps)
3339 
3340  do i = 1, natyps
3341  if(.not. prm_get_line(line)) goto 1040
3342  READ(line, *, iostat=j) tac(i), iaclib(i)%avdw(1), iaclib(i)%avdw(2), &
3343  iaclib(i)%bvdw(1), iaclib(i)%avdw(3), &
3344  iaclib(i)%bvdw(3), iaclib(i)%mass, sybyl_atom_type(i)
3345  iaclib(i)%bvdw(2) = iaclib(i)%bvdw(1)
3346  if(j > 0) goto 1040
3347  if(j < 0) sybyl_warn = .true.
3348  if(.not. index_add(tac(i), i)) then
3349  write(*,130) tac(i)
3350  end if
3351  enddo
3352  write( * , 110) natyps, 'atom types'
3353  if(sybyl_warn) write(*,'(a)') &
3354  '>>>>> WARNING: No SYBYL name for one or more atom types.'
3355  sybyl_warn = .false. !reset
3356 
3357  section = 'atom_aliases'
3358  naliases = prm_count(section)
3359  if(naliases > 0) call index_resize(natyps+naliases)
3360  do i = 1, naliases
3361  if(.not. prm_get_string_string(taci, tacj)) then
3362  goto 1060
3363  !make tac1 an alias for tac2
3364  elseif(.not. index_alias(taci, tacj)) then
3365  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tacj
3366  goto 1060
3367  end if
3368  end do
3369  write( * , 110) naliases, 'atom type alias names'
3370 
3371  j = 0
3372  do i = 1, natyps
3373  if(.not. index_get(tac(i), ityp)) then
3374  write(*,'(a,a,a)') 'ERROR: Failed to retrieve atom type ' , tac(i), ' from index.'
3375  else
3376  j = j + 1
3377  end if
3378  end do
3379 
3380  if(j<natyps) then
3381  write(*,*) '>>>>> ERROR: Bug in indexer, not all atom types found.'
3382  call prm_close
3383  return
3384  end if
3385 
3386  section = 'LJ_type2_pairs'
3387  nlj2 = prm_count(section)
3388  if(allocated(lj2)) deallocate(lj2)
3389  allocate(lj2(nlj2))
3390  do i = 1, nlj2
3391  if(.not. prm_get_string_string(taci, tacj)) goto 1050
3392  if(.not. index_get(taci, iaci)) then
3393  write(*,140) i, trim(section), taci
3394  goto 1050
3395  end if
3396  lj2(i)%i = iaci
3397  if(.not. index_get(tacj, iacj)) then
3398  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tacj
3399  goto 1050
3400  end if
3401  lj2(i)%j = iacj
3402  enddo
3403  write( * , 110) nlj2, 'LJ type 2 pairs'
3404 
3405 
3406  section = 'bonds'
3407  nbnd_types = prm_count(section)
3408  nbnd_prm = 0 !will accumulate this while reading
3409 
3410  if(allocated(bnd_prm)) deallocate(bnd_prm)
3411  if(allocated(bnd_types)) deallocate(bnd_types)
3412  allocate(bnd_prm(nbnd_types), stat=alloc_status)
3413  allocate(bnd_types(nbnd_types), stat=alloc_status)
3414  call check_alloc('bond parameters')
3415 
3416  bnd_prm_tmp%SYBYLtype = ' '
3417 
3418 
3419 
3420 
3421 bondloop: do i = 1, nbnd_types
3422 
3423  if(.not. prm_get_line(line)) goto 1000
3424  read(line, *, iostat=j) taci, tacj, bnd_prm_tmp
3425  if(j>0) goto 1000
3426  if(j<0) sybyl_warn = .true.
3427  if(.not. index_get(taci, iaci)) then
3428  write(*,140) i, trim(section), taci
3429  goto 1060
3430  end if
3431  if(.not. index_get(tacj, iacj)) then
3432  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tacj
3433  goto 1060
3434  end if
3435  !make sure to expand any aliases
3436  bnd_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3437  bnd_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3438  do j = 1, nbnd_prm
3439  if(bnd_prm(j)%prm%fk == bnd_prm_tmp%prm%fk .and. bnd_prm(j)%prm%bnd0 == bnd_prm_tmp%prm%bnd0) then
3440  bnd_types(i)%cod = j
3441  cycle bondloop !skip to next
3442  endif
3443  end do
3444  nbnd_prm = nbnd_prm + 1
3445  bnd_prm(nbnd_prm) = bnd_prm_tmp
3446  bnd_types(i)%cod = nbnd_prm
3447  end do bondloop
3448  write( * , 110) nbnd_types, 'bond types'
3449  write( * , 110) nbnd_prm, 'unique bond parameters'
3450  if(sybyl_warn) write(*,'(a)') &
3451  '>>>>> WARNING: No SYBYL bond type for one or more bond types.'
3452  sybyl_warn = .false. !reset
3453 
3454  section = 'angles'
3455  nang_types = prm_count(section)
3456  nang_prm = 0 !accumulate unique parameters while reading
3457  if(nang_types == 0) then
3458  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: Angles section not found in parameter file.'
3459  return
3460  end if
3461  if(allocated(ang_prm)) deallocate(ang_prm)
3462  allocate(ang_prm(nang_types), stat=alloc_status)
3463  if(allocated(ang_types)) deallocate(ang_types)
3464  allocate(ang_types(nang_types), stat=alloc_status)
3465  call check_alloc('angle parameters')
3466  !set optional parameters to 0.
3467  ang_prm(:)%ureyfk = 0.
3468  ang_prm(:)%ureyr0 = 0.
3469  !need to set optional parameters to 0 in ang_prm_tmp, above has no effect (???)
3470  ang_prm_tmp%ureyfk = 0.
3471  ang_prm_tmp%ureyr0 = 0.
3472 
3473 angloop:do i = 1, nang_types
3474  if(.not. prm_get_line(line)) goto 1010
3475  read(line, *, iostat=j) taci, tacj, tack, ang_prm_tmp
3476  !accept missing parameters but not read error
3477  if(j > 0) goto 1060
3478  if(.not. index_get(taci, iaci)) then
3479  write(*,140) i, trim(section), taci
3480  goto 1060
3481  end if
3482  if(.not. index_get(tacj, iacj)) then
3483  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tacj
3484  goto 1060
3485  end if
3486  if(.not. index_get(tack, iack)) then
3487  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tack
3488  goto 1060
3489  end if
3490  !make sure to expand any aliases
3491  ang_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3492  ang_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3493  ang_types(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3494  do j = 1, nang_prm
3495  if(ang_prm(j)%fk == ang_prm_tmp%fk .and. &
3496  ang_prm(j)%ang0 == ang_prm_tmp%ang0 .and. &
3497  ang_prm(j)%ureyfk == ang_prm_tmp%ureyfk .and. &
3498  ang_prm(j)%ureyr0 == ang_prm_tmp%ureyr0) then
3499  ang_types(i)%cod = j
3500  cycle angloop !skip to next
3501  endif
3502  end do
3503  nang_prm = nang_prm + 1
3504  ang_prm(nang_prm) = ang_prm_tmp
3505  ang_types(i)%cod = nang_prm
3506  end do angloop
3507  write( * , 110) nang_types, 'angle types'
3508  write( * , 110) nang_prm, ' unique angle parameters'
3509 
3510  section = 'torsions'
3511  ntor_types = prm_count(section)
3512  ntor_prm = 0 !accumulate unique parameters while reading
3513  if(ntor_types == 0) then
3514  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: Torsions section not found in parameter file.'
3515  return
3516  end if
3517  if(allocated(tor_prm)) deallocate(tor_prm)
3518  allocate(tor_prm(ntor_types), stat=alloc_status)
3519  if(allocated(tor_types)) deallocate(tor_types)
3520  allocate(tor_types(ntor_types), stat=alloc_status)
3521  call check_alloc('torsion parameters')
3522 torloop: do i = 1, ntor_types
3523  if(.not. prm_get_line(line)) goto 1020
3524  read(line, *, err = 1020) taci, tacj, tack, tacl, tor_prm_tmp
3525  if(index_get(taci, iaci, allow_wildcard=.true.)) then
3526  if(iaci > 0) then
3527  tor_types(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3528  else
3529  !wildcard found
3530  tor_types(i)%taci = ''
3531  endif
3532  else
3533  !atom type not found and not a wildcard => error
3534  write(*,140) i, trim(section), taci
3535  goto 1060
3536  end if
3537  if(index_get(tacj, iacj, allow_wildcard=.true.)) then
3538  if(iacj > 0) then
3539  tor_types(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3540  else
3541  tor_types(i)%tacj = ''
3542  endif
3543  else
3544  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tacj
3545  goto 1060
3546  end if
3547  if(index_get(tack, iack, allow_wildcard=.true.)) then
3548  if(iack > 0) then
3549  tor_types(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3550  else
3551  tor_types(i)%tack = ''
3552  endif
3553  else
3554  write(*,140) i, trim(section), tack
3555  goto 1060
3556  end if
3557  if(index_get(tacl, iacl, allow_wildcard=.true.)) then
3558  if(iacl > 0 ) then
3559  tor_types(i)%tacl = tac(iacl)
3560  else
3561  tor_types(i)%tacl = ''
3562  endif
3563  else
3564  !this field may be 0
3565  tor_types(i)%tacl = ''
3566  end if
3567  do j = 1, ntor_prm
3568  if(tor_prm(j)%fk == tor_prm_tmp%fk .and. &
3569  tor_prm(j)%rmult == tor_prm_tmp%rmult .and. &
3570  tor_prm(j)%deltor == tor_prm_tmp%deltor .and. &
3571  tor_prm(j)%paths == tor_prm_tmp%paths) then
3572  tor_types(i)%cod = j
3573  cycle torloop !skip to next
3574  endif
3575  end do
3576  ntor_prm = ntor_prm + 1
3577  tor_prm(ntor_prm) = tor_prm_tmp
3578  tor_types(i)%cod = ntor_prm
3579 
3580  end do torloop
3581  write(*, 110) ntor_types, 'torsion types'
3582  write(*, 110) ntor_prm, 'unique torsion parameters'
3583 
3584  section = 'impropers'
3585  nimp_prm = prm_count(section)
3586  if(ntor_prm == 0) then
3587  write(*,*) '>>> ERROR: Impropers section not found in parameter file.'
3588  return
3589  end if
3590  if(allocated(imp_prm)) deallocate(imp_prm)
3591  allocate(imp_prm(nimp_prm), stat=alloc_status)
3592  call check_alloc('improper parameters')
3593  do i = 1, nimp_prm
3594  if(.not. prm_get_line(line)) goto 1030
3595  read(line, *, err = 1030) taci, tacj, tack, tacl, imp_prm(i)%prm
3596  if(index_get(taci, iaci)) then
3597  imp_prm(i)%taci = tac(iaci)
3598  else
3599  !this field may be wild-card
3600  imp_prm(i)%taci = ''
3601  end if
3602  if(index_get(tacj, iacj)) then
3603  imp_prm(i)%tacj = tac(iacj)
3604  else
3605  !this field may be wild-card
3606  imp_prm(i)%tacj = ''
3607  end if
3608  if(index_get(tack, iack)) then
3609  imp_prm(i)%tack = tac(iack)
3610  else
3611  !this field may be wild-card
3612  imp_prm(i)%tack = ''
3613  end if
3614  if(index_get(tacl, iacl)) then
3615  imp_prm(i)%tacl = tac(iacl)
3616  else
3617  !this field may be wild-card
3618  imp_prm(i)%tacl = ''
3619  end if
3620  end do
3621  write( * , 110) nimp_prm, 'improper types'
3622 
3623 
3624  write( * , '(a,/)') 'Force field parameters successfully read.'
3625  ff_ok = .true.
3626  call prm_close()
3627  return
3628 
3629  110 format ('Read ',i4,' ', a)
3630  120 format ('>>> ERROR: Failed to read ',a,' number ',i4)
3631  130 format ('>>> ERROR: Could not enumerate atom type ',a, '. Duplicate name?')
3632  140 format ('>>> ERROR at line ',i3,' of section ',a,': Atom type ',a,' not found.')
3633 1000 write( * , 120) 'bond type', i
3634  call prm_close()
3635  return
3636 
3637 1010 write( * , 120) 'angle type', i
3638  call prm_close()
3639  return
3640 
3641 1020 write( * , 120) 'torsion type', i
3642  call prm_close()
3643  return
3644 
3645 1030 write( * , 120) 'improper type', i
3646  call prm_close()
3647  return
3648 
3649 1040 write( * , 120) 'atom type', i
3650  call prm_close()
3651  return
3652 
3653 1050 write( * , 120) 'LJ type 2 pair', i
3654  call prm_close()
3655  return
3656 
3657 1060 write( * , 120) trim(section), i
3658  call prm_close()
3659  return
3660 !.......................................................................
3661 end subroutine readparm
3662

3665 subroutine clearpdb
3666 
3667  nres = 0
3668  nres_solute = 0
3669  nmol = 0
3670  nat_pro = 0
3671  nat_solute = 0
3672  topo_ok = .false.
3673  if(allocated(makeh)) deallocate(makeh)
3674  if(allocated(heavy)) deallocate(heavy)
3675  if(allocated(xtop)) deallocate(xtop)
3676  if(allocated(res)) deallocate(res)
3677  if(allocated(istart_mol)) deallocate(istart_mol)
3678 
3679 end subroutine clearpdb

3683 subroutine cleartop
3684  !forget the name of the parameter file
3685  have_prm_file_name = .false.
3686  have_solute_sphere = .false.
3687  have_title = .false.
3688  topo_ok = .false.
3689 end subroutine cleartop

3691 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3692 
3693 logical function countpdb(pdb_fileno, atoms, residues, molecules)
3694 !count atoms, residues and molecules in a pdb file
3695 
3696 !arguments
3697  integer :: pdb_fileno, atoms, residues, molecules
3698 
3699 !locals
3700  integer :: resno, oldno
3701  character(len=4) :: resnam, atnam, oldresnam
3702  character(len=80) :: line
3703  real :: xtmp(3)
3704  integer :: atoms_in_res, atoms_in_file
3705  integer :: rescode, oldrescode
3706 
3707 ! old 10 format(13x,a4,a4,i5,4x,3f8.3)
3708 10 format(12x,a5,a3,2x,i4,4x,3f8.3)
3709 
3710  countpdb = .true.
3711 
3712  atoms = 0
3713  residues = 0
3714  molecules = 1
3715  atoms_in_file = 0
3716  rescode = 0
3717  oldrescode = 0
3718  oldno = 0
3719  do
3720  read(pdb_fileno,'(a)', end=100) line
3721  if(adjustl(line) == 'GAP' .or. line(1:6) == 'TER ') then
3722  molecules = molecules + 1
3723  oldrescode = 0 !avoid implicit gap check
3724  else if(line(1:6) /= 'HETATM' .and. line(1:6) /= 'ATOM ') then
3725  write(*,'(a,/,a)') '>>>WARNING: ignoring unrecognised line in PDB file', trim(line)
3726  else
3727  READ(line, 10, end = 100, err = 200) atnam, resnam, resno, xtmp(1:3)
3728  if(resno /= oldno) then
3729  if(rescode /= 0) then
3730  !check it
3731  if(atoms_in_res > lib(rescode)%nat) then
3732  write(*,12) oldresnam, oldno
3733  countpdb = .false.
3734  end if
3735  atoms = atoms + lib(rescode)%nat
3736  end if
3737  !lookup the new one
3738  do rescode = nlibres,1,-1
3739  if(lib(rescode)%nam == resnam) exit
3740  end do
3741  if(rescode == 0) then
3742  write(*,11) resno, resnam
3743  countpdb = .false.
3744  end if
3745  !check for implicit GAP
3746  if(oldrescode /= 0 .and. rescode /=0) then
3747  if(lib(oldrescode)%tail == 0 .or. &
3748  lib(rescode)%head == 0) then
3749  molecules = molecules+1
3750  end if
3751  end if
3752  !remember previous rescode
3753  oldrescode = rescode
3754 
3755  oldno = resno
3756  oldresnam = resnam
3757  atoms_in_res = 0
3758  residues = residues + 1
3759  else if(oldrescode /= 0 .and. resnam /= oldresnam) then
3760  !numbering problem?
3761  write(*, 13) oldresnam, resno, resnam
3762  countpdb = .false.
3763  end if
3764  atoms_in_file = atoms_in_file + 1
3765  atoms_in_res = atoms_in_res + 1
3766  end if
3767  !rewind but leave open
3768  end do
3769 
3770  !branch here at EOF
3771  !take care of last residue
3772 
3773 100 if(rescode /= 0) then
3774  !check it
3775  if(atoms_in_res > lib(rescode)%nat) then
3776  write(*,12) oldresnam, oldno
3777  countpdb = .false.
3778  end if
3779  atoms = atoms + lib(rescode)%nat
3780  end if
3781 
3782  write(*,15) atoms_in_file, atoms
3783  rewind(pdb_fileno)
3784  if(atoms_in_file == 0) countpdb = .false.
3785  return
3786 
3787 200 rewind(pdb_fileno) !error exit point
3788  write(*,16) line
3789  countpdb = .false.
3790 16 format('>>>>> ERROR found in line: ', a80)
3791 
3792 11 format('>>>>> ERROR: Residue number ',i5,' is of unknown type ',a4)
3793 12 format('>>>>> ERROR: Too many atoms in residue ',a4,1x,i5)
3794 13 format('>>>>> ERROR: Two residues with same number: ',a,i5,1x,a)
3795 
3796 15 format( 'PDB file contains',i6,' atoms.', /, &
3797  'The number of atoms in the topology will be',i6)
3798 
3799 end function countpdb
3800 
3801 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3802 
3803 subroutine readpdb()
3804 
3805 ! *** local variables
3806  character(len=256) :: pdb_file
3807  CHARACTER atnam_tmp * 4, resnam_tmp * 4
3808  character(len=80) :: line
3809  integer resnum_tmp, oldnum, irec, i, atom_id(max_atlib), j
3810  real xtmp(3)
3811  LOGICAL res_found, at_found
3812  integer :: first_res_of_mol
3813  logical :: last_line_was_gap
3814  integer :: atoms, residues, molecules
3815 !.......................................................................
3816 
3817  write( *, * )
3818  call get_string_arg(pdb_file, '-----> Name of PDB file: ')
3819  if(openit(3, pdb_file, 'old', 'formatted', 'read') /= 0) return
3820  rewind(3)
3821 !
3822 ! PDB format(we need only atom name, res. name, number and coords):
3823 ! The format is
3824 ! 1. | 1 - 6 | A6 | Record ID (eg ATOM, HETATM)
3825 ! 2. | 7 - 11 | I5 | Atom serial number
3826 ! - | 12 - 12 | 1X | Blank
3827 ! 3. | 13 - 16 | A4 | Atom name (eg " CA " , " ND1")
3828 ! 4. | 17 - 17 | A1 | Alternative location code (if any)
3829 ! 5. | 18 - 20 | A3 | Standard 3-letter amino acid code for residue
3830 ! - | 21 - 21 | 1X | Blank
3831 ! 6. | 22 - 22 | A1 | Chain identifier code
3832 ! 7. | 23 - 26 | I4 | Residue sequence number
3833 ! 8. | 27 - 27 | A1 | Insertion code (if any)
3834 ! - | 28 - 30 | 3X | Blank
3835 ! 9. | 31 - 38 | F8.3 | Atom's x-coordinate
3836 ! 10. | 39 - 46 | F8.3 | Atom's y-coordinate
3837 ! 11. | 47 - 54 | F8.3 | Atom's z-coordinate
3838 ! 12. | 55 - 60 | F6.2 | Occupancy value for atom
3839 ! 13. | 61 - 66 | F6.2 | B-value (thermal factor)
3840 !
3841 
3842 !Old format line 10 FORMAT(13x,a4,a4,i5,4x,3f8.3)
3843 !Format if all is read 10 format(a6,i5,1x,a4,a1,a3,1x,a1,i4,a1,3x,3f8.3)
3844 10 format(12x,a5,a3,2x,i4,4x,3f8.3)
3845 
3846 ! progress output formats
3847 20 format('molecule ',i4,': ',a4,i5)
3848 21 format(' - ',a4,i5)
3849 
3850 22 format('>>>>> ERROR: The check of the PDB file failed.')
3851 23 format('>>> WARNING: Multiple GAP lines at line',i5)
3852  oldnum = 0
3853 
3854  !get rid of old topology but not FF params
3855  call topo_deallocate(keep_ff=.true.)
3856 
3857  if(.not. countpdb(3, atoms, residues, molecules)) then
3858  write(*,22)
3859  close(3)
3860  return
3861  end if
3862 
3863  CALL clearpdb !get rid of old PDB data.
3864  call allocate_for_pdb(atoms, residues, molecules) !make space for new topology
3865  !clear hydrogen make flags
3866  makeh(:) = .false.
3867  !reset molecule counter
3868  nmol = 1
3869  istart_mol(1) = 1
3870 
3871  irec = 0
3872  do
3873  read(3,'(a)', end=100) line
3874  irec = irec + 1
3875  if(adjustl(line) == 'GAP' .or. line(1:6) == 'TER ') then
3876  if(last_line_was_gap) then
3877  write(*, 23) irec
3878  else
3879  !set gap flag - new molecule will be recognised later
3880  last_line_was_gap = .true.
3881  end if
3882  else if(line(1:6) /= 'HETATM' .and. line(1:6) /= 'ATOM ') then
3883  !do nothing
3884  else
3885  READ(line, 10, end = 100, err = 200) atnam_tmp, resnam_tmp, &
3886  resnum_tmp, xtmp(1:3)
3887 
3888  ! --- New residue ?
3889  if(resnum_tmp/=oldnum) then
3890  ! --- Check if old residue was OK...
3891  if(nres/=0) then
3892  do i = 1, lib(res(nres)%irc)%nat
3893  if(lib(res(nres)%irc)%atnam(i)(1:1) /='H') then !heavy
3894  heavy(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .true.
3895  makeh(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .false.
3896  if(atom_id(i) == 0) then !not found
3897  write(*, '(/,a,a,a,i5,/)') '>>> Heavy atom ',&
3898  lib(res(nres)%irc )%atnam(i), &
3899  ' missing in residue ', oldnum
3900  goto 210
3901  end if
3902  else !hydrogen
3903  heavy(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .false.
3904  !flag hydrogens to be generated
3905  if(atom_id(i) == 0) then
3906  !it was not in the file and needs to be made
3907  makeh(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .true.
3908  end if
3909  end if
3910  enddo
3911  endif
3912 
3913  !look up new residue in library
3914  res_found = .false.
3915  nres = nres + 1
3916  res(nres)%start = nat_pro + 1
3917  do i = 1, nlibres
3918  if(resnam_tmp==lib(i)%nam ) then
3919  res_found = .true.
3920  res(nres)%name = lib(i)%nam
3921  res(nres)%irc = i
3922  exit
3923  endif
3924  enddo
3925  if(.not.res_found) then
3926  write( * , '(/,a,a,/)') '>>> Residue not found in library: ', &
3927  resnam_tmp
3928  goto 210
3929  endif
3930  !clear atom read flags
3931  do i = 1, lib(res(nres)%irc )%nat
3932  atom_id(i) = 0
3933  enddo
3934 
3935  !check for implicit GAP, i.e. this residue and previous
3936  !have no tail or head connections, respectively.
3937  !Do this unless this is the first residue
3938  !Don't do it if previous line was gap (already done)
3939  if(nres > 1) then
3940  if(last_line_was_gap .or. &
3941  lib(res(nres-1)%irc)%tail == 0 .or. &
3942  lib(res(nres)%irc)%head == 0) then
3943  nmol = nmol + 1
3944  istart_mol(nmol) = nat_pro + 1
3945  if(first_res_of_mol /= oldnum) then
3946  write(*,21) res(nres-1)%name, oldnum
3947  else
3948  write(*,*)
3949  end if
3950  end if
3951  end if
3952  last_line_was_gap = .false.
3953  !if new molecule write output
3954  if(nat_pro + 1 == istart_mol(nmol)) then
3955  write(*,20,advance='no') nmol, resnam_tmp, resnum_tmp
3956  first_res_of_mol = resnum_tmp
3957  end if
3958  nat_pro = nat_pro + lib(res(nres)%irc )%nat
3959  !set nat_solute = nat_pro unless residue is water
3960  if(index(solvent_names, trim(resnam_tmp)) == 0) then
3961  nat_solute = nat_pro
3962  nres_solute = nres
3963  end if
3964 
3965  oldnum = resnum_tmp
3966 
3967  endif !new residue
3968 
3969  at_found = .false.
3970  do i = 1, lib(res(nres)%irc )%nat
3971  if(atnam_tmp==lib(res(nres)%irc)%atnam(i)) then
3972  at_found = .true.
3973  atom_id(i) = 1
3974  j = res(nres)%start - 1 + i
3975  xtop(j * 3 - 2) = xtmp(1)
3976  xtop(j * 3 - 1) = xtmp(2)
3977  xtop(j * 3) = xtmp(3)
3978  exit
3979  endif
3980  enddo !i
3981 
3982  if(.not.at_found) then
3983  write( * , '(/,a,a,a,i5,a,a,/)') '>>> Atom ', atnam_tmp, &
3984  ' in residue no. ', resnum_tmp, ' not found in library entry for ', &
3985  lib(res(nres)%irc)%nam
3986  goto 210
3987  endif !.not.at_found
3988  end if !line type
3989  enddo
3990 
3991 !branch here at EOF
3992 100 close(3)
3993  if(last_line_was_gap) then
3994  write(*,'(a)') '>>> Warning: PDB file ends with GAP line.'
3995  nmol = nmol - 1 !correct molecule count
3996  else
3997  !print last residue of last molecule if more than one
3998  if(first_res_of_mol /= oldnum) then
3999  write(*,21) resnam_tmp, oldnum
4000  else
4001  write(*,*)
4002  end if
4003  end if
4004 
4005 ! --- Check if last residue was OK...
4006  if(nres > 0) then !avoid crashing when reading empty file
4007  do i = 1, lib(res(nres)%irc )%nat
4008  if(lib(res(nres)%irc )%atnam(i)(1:1) /='H') then
4009  !it is a heavy (non-H) atom
4010  heavy(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .true.
4011  makeh(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .false.
4012  if(atom_id(i) == 0) then !it was not found
4013  write( * , '(/,a,a,a,i5,/)') '>>> Heavy atom ', &
4014  lib(res(nres)%irc )%atnam(i),' missing in residue ',oldnum
4015  goto 210
4016  end if
4017  else !it is a hydrogen
4018  heavy(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .false.
4019  if(atom_id(i) == 0) then
4020  !it was not read from the file and should be gerenated
4021  makeh(res(nres)%start - 1 + i) = .true.
4022  end if
4023  end if
4024  enddo
4025  end if
4026 
4027  nwat = (nat_pro - nat_solute) / 3
4028  write(*,110) nmol,nres, nres_solute, nat_pro, nat_solute
4029 110 format(/,'Successfully read PDB file with', i5,' molecules,',/,&
4030  i5,' residues totally (',i5,' in solute).',/,&
4031  i5,' atoms totally (',i5,' in solute).')
4032 
4033  write( * , '(/,a,/)') 'Sequence listing:'
4034  write( * , '(16(a4,1x))') res(1:nres)%name
4035  write( *, * )
4036 
4037  return
4038 
4039 ! error handling
4040  200 write( * , '(/,a,i5,/)') '>>> Read error on line ', irec
4041  210 write( * , '(a)') 'Correct the PDB file and try readpdb again!'
4042  write( * , '(a)') 'If the problem is in the library you need to correct it and do',&
4043  'clearlib and readlib before trying readpdb again.'
4044  close(3)
4045  CALL clearpdb
4046  pdb_file = ''
4047 end subroutine readpdb
4048 
4049 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4050 
4051 subroutine readtop
4052  ! *** local variables
4053  character(len=80) :: filnam
4054  character(len=200) :: files_to_load
4055  integer :: i, j, ires
4056  logical :: loaded, res_found
4057  integer :: fn_start, fn_end, totlen
4058  character(len=4) :: resnam_tmp
4059 
4060  CALL get_string_arg(filnam, '-----> Give name of(old) topology file: ')
4061  if(openit(10, filnam, 'old', 'formatted', 'read') /= 0) return
4062  !tell topo_read to allocate some extra space for bonds
4063  topo_ok = topo_read(u=10, require_version=2.0, extrabonds=max_extrabnd)
4064  close(10)
4065  if(.not. topo_ok) return
4066 
4067  have_title = .true.
4068  call set_default_mask
4069 
4070  !sphere is defined if topology is version 4 or later
4071  if(version >= 4) then
4072  have_solute_sphere = .true.
4073  have_solvent_boundary = .true.
4074  end if
4075 
4076  !boundary condition is defined if topology is version 4.30 or later
4077  if(version >= 4.30) then
4078  boundary_set = .true.
4079  end if
4080 
4081  coord_source = 'topology'
4082  auto_name = filnam !for automatic naming of pdb and mol2 files
4083  nwat = (nat_pro - nat_solute) / 3
4084  !reset makeH - don't need to make any hydrogens
4085  deallocate(makeh, stat=alloc_status)
4086  allocate(makeh(nat_pro))
4087  makeh(:) = .false.
4088 
4089  if(nlibres == 0) then
4090  !auto-load libraries
4091  write(*,100)
4092 100 format('Auto-loading libraries:')
4093  files_to_load = lib_files
4094  !clear lib file list
4095  lib_files = ''
4096  fn_start = 1
4097  totlen = len_trim(files_to_load)
4098  do while(fn_start < totlen)
4099  fn_end = string_part(files_to_load, ';', fn_start)
4100  filnam = files_to_load(fn_start:fn_end)
4101  call readlib(trim(filnam))
4102  fn_start = fn_end + 2
4103  end do
4104  end if
4105 
4106  !Annotate irc to residues to find atoms in residues.
4107  do ires = 1, nres
4108  res_found = .false.
4109  resnam_tmp = res(ires)%name
4110  do i = 1, nlibres
4111  if(resnam_tmp==lib(i)%nam ) then
4112  res_found = .true.
4113  res(ires)%irc = i
4114  exit
4115  end if
4116  enddo
4117  if(.not.res_found) then
4118  write( * , '(/,a,a,/)') '>>> ERROR Residue not found in loaded libraries: ', &
4119  resnam_tmp
4120  end if
4121  end do
4122 
4123 end subroutine readtop
4124

4128 ! *** local variables

4133 
4134

4156 100 format('restart file ', a)

4201 subroutine trajectory

4210  CALL get_string_arg(trj_filnam, '-----> Give name of trajectory file: ')

4217  else

4219  end if
4220  end if
4221  trj_frame = 1

4224  ' of these are in the mask')

4235  write(*,900)
4236 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Cannot define mask without topology.')
4237  else

4241  '-----> Enter atom mask (''none'' to clear):')

4255 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4256 
4257 subroutine set_cgp
4258 ! *** local variables
4259  integer ires, igp, i, ntot, ntot_solute, i3
4260  integer :: switchatom, ia, ncgp_skipped = 0
4261  real :: r2
4262  real(8) :: cgp_cent(3)
4263  integer :: nheavy
4264 
4265  ntot = 0
4266  ntot_solute = 0
4267  ncgp = 0
4268  ncgp_solute = 0
4269 
4270  !do exclusions here as well
4271  nexats = 0
4272  nexwat = 0
4273  if (.not. use_pbc) excl(:) = .false.
4274 
4275  !set chargegroups for all atoms!
4276  do ires = 1, nres
4277  do igp = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc)%ncgp
4278  if(use_pbc ) then
4279  r2 = -1 !do not exclude
4280  elseif(iuse_switch_atom == 1) then
4281  !exclude on basis of switching atom
4282  switchatom = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%switch(igp)
4283  if(.not. heavy(switchatom)) then
4284  topo_ok = .false.
4285  write(*,900) igp, lib(res(ires)%irc)%nam
4286 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Switching atom of charged group',i2,' of residue type ',a4,' is not a heavy atom.')
4287  cycle !continue looping, do not exclude
4288  endif
4289  i3 = 3*switchatom-3
4290  r2 = ( xtop(i3+1) - xpcent(1) )**2 &
4291  +( xtop(i3+2) - xpcent(2) )**2 &
4292  +( xtop(i3+3) - xpcent(3) )**2
4293  else
4294  !exclude by charge group centre
4295  cgp_cent(:) = 0
4296  do i = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp)
4297  ia = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%atcgp(i, igp)
4298  i3 = ia*3
4299  cgp_cent(:) = cgp_cent(:) + xtop(i3-2:i3)
4300  end do
4301  cgp_cent(:) = cgp_cent(:)/real(lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp))
4302  r2 = dot_product(cgp_cent(:)-xpcent(:),cgp_cent(:)-xpcent(:))
4303  endif
4304 
4305  if( (r2 < rexcl_o**2) .or. &
4306  (ires > nres_solute .and. r2 < (rexcl_o + 2.)**2)) then
4307  !is it inside? For solvent include up to 2Å outside rexcl_o too
4308  ncgp = ncgp + 1
4309  if(ires <= nres_solute) then
4310  ncgp_solute = ncgp_solute + 1
4311  ntot_solute = ntot_solute + lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp)
4312  endif
4313  cgp(ncgp)%first = ntot + 1
4314  cgp(ncgp)%last = ntot + lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp)
4315  cgp(ncgp)% iswitch = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%switch(igp)
4316  do i = 1, cgp(ncgp)%last - cgp(ncgp)%first + 1
4317  ntot = ntot + 1
4318  cgpatom(ntot) = res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%atcgp(i, igp)
4319  enddo
4320  else
4321  nexats = nexats + lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp)
4322  if(ires > nres_solute) then
4323  nexwat = nexwat + 1
4324  endif
4325  ncgp_skipped = ncgp_skipped + 1
4326  do i = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc)%natcgp(igp)
4327  excl(res(ires)%start - 1 + lib(res(ires)%irc)%atcgp(i, igp)) = .true.
4328  enddo
4329  endif
4330  enddo
4331  enddo
4332 
4333  if(ntot + nexats /= nat_pro) then
4334  write( * , '(/,a,/)') '>>> Error in set_cgp: ntot+nexats /= nat_pro.'
4335  stop
4336  endif
4337 
4338  write(*, 100) 'Made', ncgp_solute, ' solute', ntot_solute
4339  write(*, 100) 'Made', ncgp-ncgp_solute, ' solvent', ntot - ntot_solute
4340  if(nexats > 0) then
4341  write(*, 100) 'Skipped', ncgp_skipped, 'excluded', nexats
4342  endif
4343  if(nexwat > 0) then
4344  write(*, 110) nexwat
4345  endif
4346 
4347  if (.not. use_pbc) then
4348  rwat = rwat_eff()
4349  write(*,140) rwat
4350  endif
4351 
4352 100 format(a,t8,i6,a,t23,'charge groups comprising a total of ', i6,' atoms.')
4353 110 format('Excluded ',i6,' water molecules.')
4354 140 format('Effective water radius :',f6.2)
4355 end subroutine set_cgp
4356

4359 subroutine set_crg
4360 ! *** local variables
4361  integer ires, i, ntot
4362 
4363  ntot = 0
4364 
4365  do ires = 1, nres
4366  do i = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc )%nat
4367 
4368  ntot = ntot + 1
4369  crg(ntot) = lib(res(ires)%irc )%crg_lib(i)
4370 
4371  enddo
4372  enddo
4373 
4374  if(ntot/=nat_pro) then
4375  write( * , '(/,a,/)') '>>> Error in set_crg: ntot /= nat_pro.'
4376  stop
4377  endif
4378 
4379  write(*, 100) ntot
4380 100 format('Assigned',i6,' atomic charges.')

4385 subroutine set_iac
4386 ! *** local variables
4387  integer :: ires, i, ntot, iaci
4388  logical :: used(max_atyps)
4389 
4390  used(:) = .false.
4391  ntot = 0
4392  !set atom types
4393  do ires = 1, nres
4394  do i = 1, lib(res(ires)%irc )%nat
4395  ntot = ntot + 1
4396  if(.not. index_get(lib(res(ires)%irc)%tac_lib(i), iaci)) then
4397  write(*,110) lib(res(ires)%irc)%tac_lib(i), i, ires
4398  topo_ok = .false.
4399  else
4400  used(iaci) = .true.
4401  iac(ntot) = iaci
4402  end if
4403  enddo
4404  enddo
4405 
4406  !this should never happen
4407  if(ntot/=nat_pro) then
4408  write( * , '(/,a,/)') '>>>>> ERROR in set_iac: ntot /= nat_pro.'
4409  topo_ok = .false.
4410  endif
4411 
4412  do i=1, natyps
4413  if(used(i) .and. iaclib(i)%mass <= 0) then
4414  write(*, 120) tac(i), iaclib(i)%mass
4415  topo_ok = .false.
4416  end if
4417  end do
4418 
4419  if(topo_ok) write(*, 100) nat_pro
4420 100 format('Assigned',i6,' atom types.')
4421 
4422 110 format('>>>>> ERROR: Atom type ',a8,' not defined (atom',i3,' of residue',i5,'.)')
4423 120 format('>>>>> ERROR: Atom type ',a8,' has mass ',f6.2)
4424 end subroutine set_iac

4448 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4449 
4450 subroutine set_solvent_type
4451  !set solvent type (SPC-like, TIP3P-like or general)
4452 
4453  !locals
4454  integer :: irc_solvent
4455  integer :: i, iac_h1, iac_h2
4456  logical :: dummy
4457 
4458  solvent_type = solvent_general
4459 
4460  !any solvent at all?
4461  if(nwat == 0) return
4462  !look up residue code of 1st solvent molecule
4463  irc_solvent = res(nres_solute + 1)%irc
4464  !is it a 3-atom molecule?
4465  if(lib(irc_solvent)%nat /= 3) return
4466  !check if all solvent molecules are of same type
4467  do i=nres_solute + 2, nres
4468  if(res(i)%irc /= irc_solvent) return
4469  end do
4470 
4471  !now we know all solvent molecules are the same type of 3-atomic molecules
4472  solvent_type = solvent_3atom
4473 
4474  !further checks for SPC water, for which special optimisations can be used
4475  !check if atoms 2 and 3 are hydrogens
4476  if(lib(irc_solvent)%atnam(2)(1:1) /= 'H' .or. &
4477  lib(irc_solvent)%atnam(3)(1:1) /= 'H') return
4478  !check hydrogen atom types
4479  dummy = index_get(lib(irc_solvent)%tac_lib(2), iac_h1)
4480  !check that both hydrogens are same type
4481  dummy = index_get(lib(irc_solvent)%tac_lib(3), iac_h2)
4482  if(iac_h1 /= iac_h2) return
4483  !check if zero LJ params on H
4484  if(all(iaclib(iac_h1)%avdw(:) == 0.) .and. &
4485  all(iaclib(iac_h1)%bvdw(:) == 0.)) then
4486  solvent_type = solvent_spc
4487  end if
4488 end subroutine set_solvent_type

4492 integer function get_atom_from_descriptor(aid)
4493  !arguments
4494  character(*), intent(in) :: aid !string=residue:atom
4495 
4496  !locals
4497  integer :: separator_pos
4498  character(len=20) :: res_str
4499  character(len=5) :: atom_str
4500  integer :: filestat
4501  integer :: resnum, atnum
4502 
4503  get_atom_from_descriptor = 0
4504 
4505  separator_pos = scan(aid, ':')
4506  if(separator_pos < 2 .or. separator_pos == len_trim(aid)) return !no valid colon found
4507  res_str = aid(1:separator_pos-1)
4508  atom_str = aid(separator_pos+1:len_trim(aid))
4509  read(res_str, *, iostat=filestat) resnum
4510  if(filestat > 0) return
4511  get_atom_from_descriptor = find_atom(resnum, atom_str)
4512 
4513 end function get_atom_from_descriptor

4525 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4526 
4527 !Set the boundary condition & read parameterts connected to the boundary.
4528 logical function set_boundary_condition()
4529 
4530  !locals
4531  character(len=80) :: kind_of_boundary
4532 
4533  !ask if to use simulation sphere or periodic box
4534  call get_string_arg(kind_of_boundary, &
4535  '-----> Select kind of boundary: simulation sphere(1) or periodic box(2):')
4536  call upcase(kind_of_boundary)
4537  select case(kind_of_boundary)
4538 
4539  !sphere selected
4540  case('SPHERE', '1')
4541  use_pbc = .false. !set the flag
4542  !set the center and radius of the sphere
4543  if(.not. set_simulation_sphere()) then
4544  call parse_reset !clear command line
4545  return
4546  end if
4547  boundary_set = .true.
4548 
4549  !box selected
4550  case('BOX', '2')
4551  use_pbc = .true.
4552  !set the center and radius of the box
4553  if(.not. set_solvent_box()) then
4554  call parse_reset !clear command line
4555  return
4556  end if
4557  boundary_set = .true.
4558 
4559  case default
4560  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unknown boundary'
4561  set_boundary_condition = .false.
4562  return
4563  end select
4564 
4565  set_boundary_condition = .true.
4566 
4567 end function set_boundary_condition

4569 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4570 
4571 logical function set_simulation_sphere()
4572 
4573  !get centre co-ordinates
4574  !as residue:atom or x y z
4575 
4576  !locals
4577  character(len=80) :: line
4578  integer :: filestat
4579  integer :: centre_atom
4580  real :: rwat_in, xwat_in
4581 
4582  set_simulation_sphere = .false.
4583 
4584  call get_string_arg(line, '-----> Sphere centre (<x y z> or <residue:atom_name> or <"mass">): ')
4585  if(scan(line, ':') > 0) then !got res:at
4586  centre_atom=get_atom_from_descriptor(line)
4587  if(centre_atom == 0) then
4588  write(*,900) trim(line)
4589 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Could not find centre atom ',a)
4590  return
4591  end if
4592  xpcent(:) = xtop(3*centre_atom-2:3*centre_atom)
4593  elseif(scan(line, 'mass') > 0) then !define center by center of mass
4594  if (.not. get_centre_by_mass(xpcent(:))) then
4595  write(*,*) ('>>>>> ERROR: Could not create centre ')
4596  return
4597  end if
4598  else !got x
4599  read(line, *, iostat=filestat) xpcent(1)
4600  if(filestat > 0) then !invalid x coordinate
4601  return
4602  end if
4603  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Sphere centre y: ')
4604  xpcent(2) = xwat_in
4605  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Sphere centre z: ')
4606  xpcent(3) = xwat_in
4607  end if
4608 
4609  rwat_in = get_real_arg('-----> Simulation sphere radius: ')
4610  rexcl_o = rwat_in
4611  if(rexcl_o <= 0.) then
4612  write(*,800) rexcl_o
4613 800 format('>>>>> ERROR: Invalid radius ',f8.2)
4614  return
4615  end if
4616 
4617  write(*,*)
4618  write(*,100) xpcent(:)
4619  write(*,110) rexcl_o
4620 100 format('Simulation sphere centre : ',3f8.3)
4621 110 format('Simulation radius : ',f8.3)
4622  set_simulation_sphere = .true.
4623 
4624 
4625 
4626 end function set_simulation_sphere

4628 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4629 
4630 logical function set_solvent_box()
4631 
4632  !locals
4633  integer :: i !loop index
4634  character(len=80) :: line
4635  integer :: centre_atom
4636  integer :: filestat
4637  real :: xwat_in, coord_in
4638 
4639  have_solvent_boundary = .false.
4640  set_solvent_box = .false.
4641 
4642 
4643  !the centre of the PCB-box
4644  call get_string_arg(line, '-----> Periodic box centre (<x y z> or <residue:atom_name> or <"mass">): ')
4645  call upcase(line)
4646  if(scan(line, ':') > 0) then !got res:at
4647  centre_atom=get_atom_from_descriptor(line)
4648  if(centre_atom == 0) then
4649  write(*,900) trim(line)
4650 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Could not find centre atom ',a)
4651  return
4652  end if
4653  boxcentre(:) = xtop(3*centre_atom-2:3*centre_atom)
4654  elseif(line == 'MASS') then !define center by center of mass
4655  if (.not. get_centre_by_mass(boxcentre(:))) then
4656  write(*,*) ('>>>>> ERROR: Could not create centre ')
4657  return
4658  end if
4659  else !got x
4660  read(line, *, iostat=filestat) boxcentre(1)
4661  if(filestat > 0) then !invalid x coordinate
4662  return
4663  end if
4664  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Box centre y: ')
4665  boxcentre(2) = xwat_in
4666  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Box centre z: ')
4667  boxcentre(3) = xwat_in
4668  end if
4669 
4670 
4671  !read the size of the box
4672  coord_in = get_real_arg('-----> Boxlength x-direction: ')
4673  boxlength(1) = coord_in
4674  coord_in = get_real_arg('-----> Boxlength y-direction: ')
4675  boxlength(2) = coord_in
4676  coord_in = get_real_arg('-----> Boxlength z-direction: ')
4677  boxlength(3) = coord_in
4678 
4679  if( any(boxlength(:) == 0.0) ) then
4680  inv_boxl(:) = 0.0
4681  else
4682  inv_boxl(:) = 1.0/boxlength(:)
4683  end if
4684 
4685  do i=1,3
4686  if( boxlength(i) < 0 ) then
4687  write(*, '(a)') '>>>>> WARNING: Boxlength with negative sign. Converting to positive.'
4688  boxlength(i) = -boxlength(i)
4689  end if
4690  end do
4691 
4692  have_solvent_boundary = .true.
4693  set_solvent_box = .true.
4694 
4695 end function set_solvent_box
4696 
4697 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4698 
4699 subroutine solvate
4700  ! Make sure boundary condition is set.
4701  if (.not. boundary_set) then
4702  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR Boundary unknown'
4703  write(*,'(a)') "Use <boundary> to define boundary condition"
4704  return
4705  end if
4706 
4707  if (use_pbc) then
4708  call solvate_box
4709  else
4710  call solvate_sphere
4711  end if
4712 
4713 end subroutine solvate
4714

4717 subroutine solvate_box
4718  character(len=80) :: solvate_mode
4719 
4720  write(*,'(a)') 'Using predefined boxcentre and boxlengths.'
4721  write(*,101) boxcentre
4722  write(*,102) boxlength
4723 101 format('Boxcentre (x,y,z) : ',3f8.3)
4724 102 format('Boxlengths (x,y,z) : ',3f8.3)
4725 
4726  !chose solvation mode
4727  call get_string_arg(solvate_mode, &
4728  '-----> Select solvation mode: grid(1), file(2), restart(3): ')
4729  call upcase(solvate_mode)
4730 
4731  select case(solvate_mode)
4732  case ('GRID', '1')
4733  call solvate_box_grid
4734 
4735  case ('FILE', '2')
4736  call solvate_box_file
4737 
4738  case('RESTART', '3')
4739  call solvate_restart
4740 
4741  case default
4742  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unknown mode of solvation.'
4743  call parse_reset
4744  return
4745  end select
4746 
4747 end subroutine solvate_box
4748 
4749 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4750 
4751 subroutine solvate_box_grid
4752 
4753 !solvate sphere using grid
4754 
4755  !locals
4756 
4757  real(8) :: xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax
4758  real(8) :: xgrid, ygrid, zgrid
4759  integer :: max_wat !max number of molecules
4760  integer :: waters_in_box
4761  real(8) :: radius2, solvent_grid
4762  character(len=200) :: solvent
4763 
4764  !set water residue name
4765  call get_string_arg(solvent, &
4766  '-----> Enter library entry name for water molecule: ')
4767  solvent_name = solvent(1:4)
4768  !get residue code for solvent
4769  if(.not. set_irc_solvent()) return
4770 
4771  !calc cubic grid spacing from density
4772  if(lib(irc_solvent)%density > 0.) then
4773  solvent_grid = lib(irc_solvent)%density**(-1/3.)
4774  else
4775  write(*,900) lib(irc_solvent)%nam
4776 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Density not set in library entry ',a)
4777  return
4778  end if
4779 
4780 
4781  !Make sure boxsize is consistent with the periodic boundary condition
4782  !changed to nearest integer (nint) from truncation (int) /M.A.
4783  boxlength(1) = nint(boxlength(1)/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
4784  boxlength(2) = nint(boxlength(2)/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
4785  boxlength(3) = nint(boxlength(3)/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
4786 
4787 !Calculate max number of waters possible
4788  max_wat = lib(irc_solvent)%density * boxlength(1) * boxlength(2) * boxlength(3)
4789 
4790  allocate(xw(3,lib(irc_solvent)%nat,max_wat), keep(max_wat), stat=alloc_status)
4791  call check_alloc('water sphere co-ordinate array')
4792 
4793 
4794  xmin = boxcentre(1) - boxlength(1)/2 + solvent_grid/2
4795  xmax = boxcentre(1) + boxlength(1)/2 - solvent_grid/2
4796  ymin = boxcentre(2) - boxlength(2)/2 + solvent_grid/2
4797  ymax = boxcentre(2) + boxlength(2)/2 - solvent_grid/2
4798  zmin = boxcentre(3) - boxlength(3)/2 + solvent_grid/2
4799  zmax = boxcentre(3) + boxlength(3)/2 - solvent_grid/2
4800 
4801  write(*,100) boxlength(1), boxlength(2), boxlength(3), solvent_grid
4802 100 format('New boxlength = ',3f8.2,' A',/ &
4803  'Grid spacing = ',f10.2,' A ')
4804 
4805  !Fill box with water
4806  !xmax+0.1 is needed for intel/windows. Otherwise the last loop step is skipped
4807  waters_in_box = 0
4808  xgrid = xmin
4809  do while (xgrid <= xmax + 0.1)
4810  ygrid = ymin
4811  do while (ygrid <= ymax + 0.1)
4812  zgrid = zmin
4813  do while (zgrid <= zmax + 0.1)
4814  waters_in_box = waters_in_box + 1
4815  xw(1,1,waters_in_box) = xgrid
4816  xw(2,1,waters_in_box) = ygrid
4817  xw(3,1,waters_in_box) = zgrid
4818  !all the molecules inside are inside
4819  keep(waters_in_box) = .true.
4820  zgrid = zgrid + solvent_grid
4821  end do
4822  ygrid = ygrid + solvent_grid
4823  end do
4824  xgrid = xgrid + solvent_grid
4825  end do
4826 
4827  call add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere=waters_in_box, &
4828  max_waters=waters_in_box, make_hydrogens=.true., pack=solvent_pack)
4829  deallocate(xw,keep)
4830 
4831 end subroutine solvate_box_grid
4832 
4833 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
4834 subroutine solvate_box_file
4835 
4836 !local variables
4837  character(len=80) :: xwat_file
4838  integer :: fstat
4839  character(len=80) :: line
4840  real(8) :: boxl, waterbox_v, waterbox(1:3)
4841  character(len=6) :: sphere
4842  logical :: replicate
4843  integer :: extension(1:3)
4844  real(8) :: extensionbox_v, ext(3,3)
4845  integer :: nw, nnw !water molecule counters
4846  integer :: i, j, k !loop indecis
4847  integer :: filestat !error variable
4848  character(len=3) :: atomnames
4849  character(len=4) :: resnam(3)
4850  integer :: resno(3)
4851  integer :: nbox !number of replicated boxes
4852  integer :: nwat_allocate
4853  real(8) :: xcm(3) !center of the waterbox
4854  real(8) :: wshift(3) !distanse to move waters
4855  integer :: nwat_keep !how many waters to keep
4856  real(8) :: temp(3) !temporary coordinate
4857 
4858 !get the name of the file and open the file in unit 13
4859  call get_string_arg(xwat_file, '-----> Solvent file name: ')
4860  open (unit=13, file=xwat_file, status='old', form='formatted', action='read', iostat=fstat)
4861 
4862  if( fstat /= 0 ) then
4863  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Could not open water coordinate file.'
4864  call parse_reset
4865  return
4866  end if
4867 
4868 !read the size of the waterbox
4869  read(13, '(a80)') line
4870  read(line, *, iostat=fstat) boxl
4871  if( fstat /= 0 ) then
4872  write(*, '(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Size not specified in water file.'
4873  close(13)
4874  call parse_reset
4875  return
4876  end if
4877  if( boxl < 0 ) then
4878  write(*, '(a)' ) '>>>>> WARNING: Size with negative sign. Converting to positive.'
4879  boxl = - boxl
4880  end if
4881 
4882 !check if the file contains a sphere of water instead of a box
4883  read(line, *, iostat=fstat) boxl, sphere
4884  call upcase(sphere)
4885  if(sphere == 'SPHERE' ) then
4886  write(*, '(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: This file containts a sphere of water. Use a file with a box of water instead.'
4887  close(13)
4888  call parse_reset
4889  return
4890  end if
4891 
4892 !Compute waterbox volume and display the waterbox sidelength
4893  waterbox(:) = boxl
4894  waterbox_v = boxl**3
4895  write(*, '(a, f10.3)') 'Boxlength of solvent file =', waterbox(1)
4896 
4897 !Determine residue name to use for solvent molecule
4898  read(13,1) atomnames(1:1), solvent_name
4899  backspace(13)
4900  if( .not. set_irc_solvent() ) then
4901  close(13)
4902  call parse_reset
4903  return
4904  else if( lib(irc_solvent)%nat /= 3 ) then
4905  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Solvate only works for 3-atom solvents (in this version).'
4906  close(13)
4907  call parse_reset
4908  return
4909  else if( lib(irc_solvent)%density <= 0. ) then
4910  write(*, '(a, a)' ) '>>>>> ERROR: Density not set in library entry ', lib(irc_solvent)%nam
4911  close(13)
4912  call parse_reset
4913  return
4914  end if
4915 
4916 !Estimate amount of memory to allocate for temporary waters
4917  if( all(boxlength(:)<waterbox(1)) ) then ! don't need to replicate. 5% margin
4918  replicate = .false.
4919  nwat_allocate = int( lib(irc_solvent)%density*1.05*waterbox_v )
4920 
4921  else !the waterbox is not big enough
4922  replicate = .true.
4923  !find out in wich direction replication is needed
4924  extension(:) = ceiling( boxlength(:)/boxl )
4925  extensionbox_v = extension(1)*extension(2)*extension(3)*waterbox_v
4926  nwat_allocate = int( lib(irc_solvent)%density*1.05*extensionbox_v )
4927  end if
4928 
4929  allocate( xw(3, lib(irc_solvent)%nat, nwat_allocate), keep(nwat_allocate), stat=alloc_status )
4930  call check_alloc('temporary solvent coord. arrays')
4931 
4932 !The reading of the coordinates
4933 1 format(13x, a1, 3x, a4, i5, 4x, 3f8.3)
4934 
4935  nw = 0
4936 
4937  do i = 1, nwat_allocate-1
4938  read(13, 1, iostat=filestat, end=10) &
4939  atomnames(1:1), resnam(1), resno(1), xw(:, 1, nw+1), &
4940  & atomnames(2:2), resnam(2), resno(2), xw(:, 2, nw+1), &
4941  & atomnames(3:3), resnam(3), resno(3), xw(:, 3, nw+1)
4942  !checking the read info
4943  if(filestat > 0) then
4944  write(*, 7) nw
4945  close(13)
4946  call parse_reset
4947  deallocate(xw, keep)
4948  return
4949  else if ( any( resnam(:)/=solvent_name ) ) then
4950  write(*, 8) solvent_name, nw
4951  close(13)
4952  call parse_reset
4953  deallocate(xw, keep)
4954  return
4955  else if ( any( resno(:)/=resno(1) ) ) then
4956  write(*, 9) nw
4957  close(13)
4958  call parse_reset
4959  deallocate(xw, keep)
4960  return
4961  else
4962  nw = nw + 1
4963  end if
4964  end do
4965 
4966 7 format('>>>>> ERROR: Read failure at molecule', i6)
4967 8 format('>>>>> ERROR: Residue name other than ', a4, ' found at molecule ', i6)
4968 9 format('>>>>> ERROR: Inconsistent residue numbering at molecule ', i6)
4969 
4970 10 write(*, '(a, i10)') 'No. of molecules in solvent file ', nw
4971 
4972  nnw = nw
4973 !Replicate if necessary
4974  if(replicate) then
4975  write(*, '(a)') 'Replicating box of water...'
4976  ext(:,1) = (/boxl, 0._8, 0._8/)
4977  ext(:,2) = (/0._8, boxl, 0._8/)
4978  ext(:,3) = (/0._8, 0._8, boxl/)
4979 
4980  nbox = 0
4981  do k=1,3 !the three coordinates
4982  if( .not. extension(k) > 1) cycle
4983 
4984  do i = 1,extension(k)-1
4985  nbox = nbox + 1
4986  do j = 1,nw
4987  nnw = nnw + 1
4988  xw(:,1,nnw) = xw(:,1,j) + i*ext(k,:)
4989  xw(:,2,nnw) = xw(:,2,j) + i*ext(k,:)
4990  xw(:,3,nnw) = xw(:,3,j) + i*ext(k,:)
4991  end do
4992  waterbox(k) = waterbox(k) + boxl
4993  end do
4994  nw = nnw
4995  end do
4996 
4997  nw = nnw
4998  write(*, '(a, i5, a)') 'Added', nbox, ' boxes of water'
4999  write(*,'(a, i10)') 'No of molecules after replication = ', nw
5000 
5001  end if
5002 
5003 
5004 !Compute the centre coordinates for the waterbox
5005  xcm(:) = sum( sum(xw, dim=3), dim=2) / (nw*lib(irc_solvent)%nat)
5006  wshift(:) = boxcentre(:) - xcm(:)
5007 
5008 !Remove water molecules outside of periodic box
5009  nwat_keep = 0
5010 
5011  do i = 1,nw
5012  temp = xw(:,1,i)
5013 
5014  if(all(temp(:)<xcm(:)+0.5*boxlength(:)) &
5015  .and. all(temp(:)>xcm(:)-0.5*boxlength(:))) then
5016  !keep this molecule
5017  nwat_keep = nwat_keep + 1
5018  keep(i) = .true.
5019  !shift to periodic box centre
5020  do j = 1, lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5021  xw(:, j, i) = xw(:, j, i) + wshift(:)
5022  end do
5023 
5024  else !do not keep this molecule
5025  keep(i) = .false.
5026 
5027  end if
5028 
5029  end do
5030 
5031 !Add solvent to topology
5032  call add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere=nwat_keep, max_waters=nw, &
5033  make_hydrogens=.false., pack=solvent_pack)
5034 
5035  close(13)
5036  deallocate(xw, keep)
5037 
5038 end subroutine solvate_box_file
5039

5042 subroutine solvate_sphere
5043 
5044  character(len=80) :: solvate_mode
5045 
5046  if(.not. set_solvent_sphere()) then
5047  call parse_reset !clear command line
5048  return
5049  end if
5050 
5051  !chose solvation mode
5052  call get_string_arg(solvate_mode, &
5053  '-----> Select solvation mode: grid(1), file(2), restart(3), DWF(4): ')
5054  call upcase(solvate_mode)
5055 
5056  select case(solvate_mode)
5057  case ('GRID','1')
5058  call solvate_sphere_grid
5059 
5060  case ('FILE','2')
5061  call solvate_sphere_file(.true.)
5062 
5063  case ('RESTART','3')
5064  call solvate_restart
5065 
5066  case ('DWF','4')
5067  call solvate_sphere_file(.false.)
5068 
5069  case default
5070  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unknown mode of solvation.'
5071  call parse_reset
5072  return
5073  end select
5074 
5075 end subroutine solvate_sphere

5077 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5078 
5079 logical function set_solvent_sphere()
5080 
5081  !locals
5082  character(len=80) :: line
5083  integer :: filestat
5084  integer :: centre_atom
5085  real :: rwat_in, xwat_in
5086 
5087  set_solvent_sphere = .false.
5088  have_solvent_boundary = .false.
5089 
5090  if (have_title) then !Print old centre if available
5091  write(*,'(a,3f8.3)') 'Previous solvent centre:', xwcent(1), xwcent(2), xwcent(3)
5092  end if
5093  call get_string_arg(line, '-----> Sphere centre (<x y z> or <residue:atom_name> or <"mass"> or <"boundary">): ')
5094  call upcase(line)
5095 
5096  if(scan(line, ':') > 0) then !got res:at
5097  centre_atom=get_atom_from_descriptor(line)
5098  if(centre_atom == 0) then
5099  write(*,900) trim(line)
5100 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Could not find centre atom ',a)
5101  return
5102  end if
5103  xwcent(:) = xtop(3*centre_atom-2:3*centre_atom)
5104  elseif(line == 'MASS') then !define center by center of mass
5105  if (.not. get_centre_by_mass(xwcent(:))) then
5106  write(*,*) ('>>>>> ERROR: Could not create centre ')
5107  return
5108  end if
5109  elseif(line == 'BOUNDARY') then !define center same as boundary center
5110  xwcent = xpcent
5111  else !got x
5112  read(line, *, iostat=filestat) xwcent(1)
5113  if(filestat > 0) then !invalid x coordinate
5114  return
5115  end if
5116  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Sphere centre y: ')
5117  xwcent(2) = xwat_in
5118  xwat_in=get_real_arg('-----> Sphere centre z: ')
5119  xwcent(3) = xwat_in
5120  end if
5121 
5122  if (have_title) then !Print old radius if available
5123  write(*,'(a,f8.3)') 'Previous effective solvent radius:', rwat_eff()
5124  rwat_in = get_real_arg('-----> Solvation sphere radius: ')
5125  else
5126  rwat_in = get_real_arg('-----> Solvation sphere radius: ')
5127  end if
5128  rwat = rwat_in
5129  if(rwat == 0.) then
5130  return
5131  end if
5132 
5133  write(*,*)
5134  write(*,100) xwcent(:)
5135 100 format('Solvation sphere centre : ',3f8.3)
5136 
5137  set_solvent_sphere = .true.
5138  have_solvent_boundary = .true.
5139 
5140 end function set_solvent_sphere

5142 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
5143 
5144 subroutine solvate_sphere_grid
5145 
5146 !solvate sphere using grid
5147 
5148  !locals
5149 
5150  real(8) :: xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax
5151  real(8) :: xgrid, ygrid, zgrid
5152  integer :: max_wat !max number of molecules
5153  integer :: waters_in_sphere
5154  real(8) :: radius2, solvent_grid
5155  character(len=200) :: solvent
5156 
5157  !set water residue name
5158  call get_string_arg(solvent, &
5159  '-----> Enter library entry name for water molecule: ')
5160  solvent_name = solvent(1:4)
5161  !get residue code for solvent
5162  if(.not. set_irc_solvent()) return
5163 
5164  !calc cubic grid spacing from density
5165  if(lib(irc_solvent)%density > 0.) then
5166  solvent_grid = lib(irc_solvent)%density**(-1/3.)
5167  else
5168  write(*,900) lib(irc_solvent)%nam
5169 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Density not set in library entry ',a)
5170  return
5171  end if
5172 
5173  max_wat = (2*rwat+solvent_grid)**3 / solvent_grid**3
5174  radius2 = rwat**2
5175 
5176  allocate(xw(3,lib(irc_solvent)%nat,max_wat), keep(max_wat), stat=alloc_status)
5177  call check_alloc('water sphere co-ordinate array')
5178 
5179  xmin = xwcent(1) - int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5180  xmax = xwcent(1) + int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5181  ymin = xwcent(2) - int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5182  ymax = xwcent(2) + int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5183  zmin = xwcent(3) - int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5184  zmax = xwcent(3) + int(rwat/solvent_grid)*solvent_grid
5185 
5186  write(*,100) rwat, solvent_grid
5187 100 format('Radius of solvent sphere = ',f10.2,' A',/ &
5188  'Grid spacing = ',f10.2,' A ')
5189 
5190  !constuct water-only sphere
5191  !xmax+0.1 is needed for intel/windows. Otherwise the last loop step is skipped
5192  waters_in_sphere = 0
5193  xgrid = xmin
5194  do while (xgrid <= xmax + 0.1)
5195  ygrid = ymin
5196  do while (ygrid <= ymax + 0.1)
5197  zgrid = zmin
5198  do while (zgrid <= zmax + 0.1)
5199  if( .not. ((xgrid-xwcent(1))**2 + (ygrid-xwcent(2))**2 &
5200  + (zgrid-xwcent(3))**2 > radius2) ) then
5201  waters_in_sphere = waters_in_sphere + 1
5202  !if not outside keep these coordinates
5203  xw(1,1,waters_in_sphere) = xgrid
5204  xw(2,1,waters_in_sphere) = ygrid
5205  xw(3,1,waters_in_sphere) = zgrid
5206  !all the molecules inside are inside
5207  keep(waters_in_sphere) = .true.
5208  endif
5209  zgrid = zgrid + solvent_grid
5210  end do
5211  ygrid = ygrid + solvent_grid
5212  end do
5213  xgrid = xgrid + solvent_grid
5214  end do
5215 
5216  call add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere=waters_in_sphere, &
5217  max_waters=waters_in_sphere, make_hydrogens=.true., pack=solvent_pack)
5218  deallocate(xw,keep)
5219 
5220 end subroutine solvate_sphere_grid
