5222 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
5223 
5224 subroutine solvate_sphere_file(shift)
5225 ! parameters
5226  logical, intent(in), optional:: shift
5227 
5228 ! local variables
5229  integer :: i,j,nw,nnw
5230  integer :: nwat_allocate, nwat_keep
5231  real(8) :: rmax2,dx2,boxl, newboxl
5232  real(8), save :: xcm(3),wshift(3)
5233  integer :: fstat
5234  logical :: is_box
5235  character(len=6) :: sphere
5236  character(len=80) :: line
5237  real(8) :: volume
5238  real :: r4dum
5239  character(len=80) :: xwat_file
5240  real(8) :: xwshift(3,7)
5241  integer :: box
5242  character(len=3) :: atomnames
5243  integer :: filestat
5244  character(len=10) :: filepos
5245  integer :: resno(3)
5246  character(len=4) :: resnam(3)
5247 
5248  real(8) :: xwtmp(3, max_atlib)
5249  integer :: at_id(max_atlib)
5250 
5251  call get_string_arg(xwat_file, '-----> Solvent file name: ')
5252  open (unit=13, file=xwat_file, status='old', form='formatted', &
5253  action='read', iostat=fstat)
5254  if(fstat /= 0) then
5255  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Could not open water coordinate file.'
5256  call parse_reset
5257  return
5258  end if
5259 
5260 2 format('Boxlength of solvent file = ',f10.3)
5261 3 format('Radius of sphere in solvent file = ',f10.3)
5262 
5263  ! --> water coordinate file for initial generation (13)
5264 
5265  read (13,'(a80)') line
5266  read(line,*, iostat=fstat) boxl
5267  if(fstat /=0 ) then
5268  write(*,'(a)') 'ERROR >>>>>: Size not specified in water file.'
5269  close(13)
5270  call parse_reset
5271  return
5272  end if
5273  read(line, *, iostat=fstat) boxl, sphere
5274  call upcase(sphere)
5275  if(sphere == 'SPHERE') then
5276  volume = boxl**3*4*pi/3.
5277  is_box = .false.
5278  write(*,3) boxl
5279  else
5280  volume = boxl**3
5281  is_box = .true.
5282  write(*,2) boxl
5283  end if
5284 
5285  !determine residue name to use for solvent molecules
5286  read(13,1) atomnames(1:1), solvent_name
5287  backspace(13)
5288  if(.not. set_irc_solvent()) then
5289  goto 999
5290  else if(lib(irc_solvent)%nat /= 3) then
5291  write(*,900)
5292 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: Solvate only works for 3-atom solvents (in this version).')
5293  goto 999
5294  else if(lib(irc_solvent)%density <= 0.) then
5295  write(*,910) lib(irc_solvent)%nam
5296 910 format('>>>>> ERROR: Density not set in library entry ',a)
5297  goto 999
5298  end if
5299 
5300  ! estimate amount of memory to allocate for temporary water coordinates
5301  if((is_box .and. abs(rwat) <= boxl/2.)) then
5302  !don't need to replicate
5303  !5% safety margin
5304  nwat_allocate = int(lib(irc_solvent)%density*1.05*volume)
5305  elseif(is_box) then
5306  newboxl = boxl*2**(int(log(abs(rwat)*2/boxl)/log(2.)+0.9999))
5307  nwat_allocate = int(lib(irc_solvent)%density*1.05*newboxl**3)
5308  elseif(abs(rwat) > boxl) then !it's a sphere and it's too small
5309  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Water sphere in the file is too small.'
5310  call parse_reset
5311  close(13)
5312  return
5313  else !its a sufficiently big sphere
5314  nwat_allocate = int(lib(irc_solvent)%density*1.05*volume)
5315  endif
5316  allocate(xw(3,lib(irc_solvent)%nat,nwat_allocate), keep(nwat_allocate), &
5317  stat=alloc_status)
5318  call check_alloc('temporary solvent coord. arrays')
5319 
5320  rmax2 = rwat**2
5321  nw = 0
5322 1 format(13x,a1,3x,a4,i5,4x,3f8.3)
5323  do i=1,nwat_allocate-1
5324  read (13,1,iostat=filestat, end=10) &
5325  atomnames(1:1), resnam(1), resno(1), xw(:, 1,nw+1), &
5326  atomnames(2:2), resnam(2), resno(2), xw(:, 2,nw+1), &
5327  atomnames(3:3), resnam(3), resno(3), xw(:, 3,nw+1)
5328  if(filestat > 0) then
5329  write(*,8) nw
5330  goto 999
5331  elseif(any(resnam(:) /= solvent_name)) then
5332  write(*,9) solvent_name, nw
5333  goto 999
5334  elseif(any(resno(:) /= resno(1))) then
5335  write(*,7) nw
5336  goto 999
5337  else
5338  nw = nw+1
5339  end if
5340  end do
5341 7 format('>>>>> ERROR: Inconsistent residue numbering at molecule',i6)
5342 8 format('>>>>> ERROR: Read failure at molecule',i6)
5343 9 format('>>>>> ERROR: Residue name other than ',a4,&
5344  ' found at molecule ',i6)
5345 10 write (*,20) nw
5346 20 format ('No. of molecules in solvent file = ',i10)
5347 
5348  ! --- Replicate box if necessary
5349 
5350  nnw = nw
5351  if (is_box .and. abs(rwat) .gt. boxl/2. ) then
5352  do while ( abs(rwat) .gt. boxl/2. )
5353  write (*,'(a)') 'Replicating periodic box...'
5354 
5355  xwshift(:,1) = (/boxl, 0._8, 0._8/)
5356  xwshift(:,2) = (/0._8, boxl, 0._8/)
5357  xwshift(:,3) = (/0._8, 0._8, boxl/)
5358  xwshift(:,4) = (/boxl, boxl, 0._8/)
5359  xwshift(:,5) = (/boxl, 0._8, boxl/)
5360  xwshift(:,6) = (/0._8, boxl, boxl/)
5361  xwshift(:,7) = (/boxl, boxl, boxl/)
5362 
5363  do i=1,nw
5364  do box = 1,7
5365  nnw = nnw+1
5366  xw(:,1,nnw) = xw(:,1,i) + xwshift(:,box)
5367  xw(:,2,nnw) = xw(:,2,i) + xwshift(:,box)
5368  xw(:,3,nnw) = xw(:,3,i) + xwshift(:,box)
5369  end do
5370  end do
5371  boxl = 2.*boxl
5372  nw = nnw
5373  write (*,28) nw
5374 28 format ('Number of molecules after replication = ',i10)
5375  end do
5376  end if
5377 
5378  !no water coord shift
5379 ! shift(:) = 0.
5380 ! cm(:) = xwcent(:)
5381 
5382  ! shift water coords from water center of mass to sphere center
5383  ! do not shift for "dedicated water file"
5384  if(shift) then ! shift == TRUE => normal water file equilibrated without solute
5385  !xcm = center of mass for solvent atoms
5386  xcm(:) = sum(sum(xw, dim=3), dim=2)/(nw*lib(irc_solvent)%nat)
5387  wshift(:) = xwcent(:) -xcm(:) + epsilon(r4dum)
5388 
5389  nnw = 0
5390  nwat_keep = 0
5391  do i=1,nw
5392  dx2 = dot_product(xw(:,1,i)-xcm(:),xw(:,1,i)-xcm(:))
5393  if(dx2 <= rmax2) then
5394  nwat_keep = nwat_keep+1
5395  !shift to xwcent
5396  do j = 1, lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5397  xw(:,j,i) = xw(:,j,i) + wshift(:)
5398  end do
5399  keep(i) = .true. ! water i is in sphere
5400  else
5401  keep(i) = .false.
5402  end if
5403  end do
5404  else ! shift == FALSE => water file equilibrated with solute
5405  do i=1,nw
5406  dx2 = dot_product(xw(:,1,i)-xwcent(:),xw(:,1,i)-xwcent(:))
5407  if(dx2 <= rmax2) then
5408  nwat_keep = nwat_keep+1
5409  keep(i) = .true. ! water i is in sphere
5410  else
5411  keep(i) = .false.
5412  end if
5413  end do
5414  endif
5415 
5416 
5417 
5418  call add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere=nwat_keep, &
5419  max_waters=nw, make_hydrogens=.false., pack=solvent_pack)
5420  !branch here on error
5421 999 close(13)
5422  deallocate(xw,keep)
5423 
5424 end subroutine solvate_sphere_file
5425 
5426 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
5427 
5428 subroutine solvate_restart
5429 
5430 !locals
5431  integer(4) :: natom, nat3, waters_added
5432  character(len=80) :: xfile
5433  integer :: u, fstat
5434  real(8),allocatable :: xtmp(:)
5435  character(len=200) :: solvent
5436 
5437  u=freefile()
5438 
5439  call get_string_arg(xfile, '-----> Restart file name: ')
5440  open (unit=u, file=xfile, status='old', form='unformatted', &
5441  action='read', iostat=fstat)
5442  if(fstat /= 0) then
5443  write(*,'(a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Could not open restart file.'
5444  call parse_reset
5445  return
5446  end if
5447 
5448  !set water residue name
5449  call get_string_arg(solvent, &
5450  '-----> Enter library entry name for water molecule: ')
5451  solvent_name = solvent(1:4)
5452  !get residue code for solvent
5453  if(.not. set_irc_solvent()) return
5454 
5455  read(u) nat3
5456  natom = nat3/3
5457  if(natom == nat_pro) then
5458  write(*,10)
5459 10 format('>>>>> ERROR: No. of atoms in restart file not greater than in topology.')
5460  close(u)
5461  return
5462  elseif(mod(natom-nat_pro,3) /= 0) then
5463  write(*,20) natom
5464 20 format('>>>>> ERROR:',i6,' new atoms in restart file is not a multiple of 3.')
5465  close(u)
5466  return
5467  end if
5468 
5469 
5470  waters_added = (natom-nat_pro)/3
5471  call grow_arrays_for_solvent(waters_added, 3)
5472  allocate(xtmp(nat3))
5473  backspace(u)
5474  read(u) nat3, xtmp(1:nat3)
5475  close(u)
5476  allocate(xw(3,3,waters_added), keep(waters_added))
5477  xw(:,:,:) = reshape(xtmp(3*nat_pro+1:nat3),(/3,3,waters_added/))
5478  keep(:) = .true.
5479 
5480  !allow very tight packing of waters to solute - this is a restart file!
5481  call add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere=waters_added, &
5482  max_waters=waters_added, make_hydrogens=.false., pack=0.)
5483  deallocate(xtmp,xw,keep)
5484 
5485 end subroutine solvate_restart
5486 
5487 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
5488 subroutine add_solvent_to_topology(waters_in_sphere, max_waters, make_hydrogens, pack)
5489 !arguments
5490  integer :: waters_in_sphere
5491  integer :: max_waters
5492  logical :: make_hydrogens
5493  real :: pack
5494 !locals
5495  integer :: waters_added
5496  real(8) :: rpack2
5497  integer :: w_at, w_mol, p_atom
5498  logical :: wheavy(max_atlib)
5499  real(8) :: dx, dy, dz, r2
5500  integer :: next_wat, next_atom
5501 
5502  if(use_pbc) then
5503  write(*,111) waters_in_sphere
5504  else
5505  write(*,110) waters_in_sphere
5506  end if
5507 110 format('No. of solvent molecules in the sphere:', i6)
5508 111 format('No. of solvent molecules in the box:', i6)
5509 
5510  !exclude water molecues close to heavy solute atoms
5511  write(*,120) pack
5512 120 format('Minimum distance to solute heavy atoms:',f6.2,' A')
5513 
5514  waters_added = 0
5515  rpack2 = pack**2
5516 
5517  do w_at = 1, lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5518  if(lib(irc_solvent)%atnam(w_at)(1:1) == 'H') then
5519  wheavy(w_at) = .false.
5520  else
5521  wheavy(w_at) = .true.
5522  end if
5523  end do
5524 
5525  !loop over solvent molecules
5526 wloop:do w_mol = 1, max_waters
5527  !skip if not in sphere or box
5528  if(.not. keep(w_mol)) cycle wloop
5529 
5530  !loop over atoms in solvent molecule
5531  do w_at = 1, lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5532  !skip hydrogens
5533  if(.not. wheavy(w_at)) cycle
5534  !check clash with all other heavy atoms
5535 ploop: do p_atom = 1, nat_pro !for each water check all other atoms
5536  if(heavy(p_atom)) then
5537  !clash with a heavy atom?
5538  !*****PWchanged way of computing packing
5539  dx = xtop(3*p_atom-2) - xw(1,w_at,w_mol)
5540  dy = xtop(3*p_atom-1) - xw(2,w_at,w_mol)
5541  dz = xtop(3*p_atom ) - xw(3,w_at,w_mol)
5542  if( use_pbc ) then
5543  dx = dx - boxlength(1)*nint( dx*inv_boxl(1) )
5544  dy = dy - boxlength(2)*nint( dy*inv_boxl(2) )
5545  dz = dz - boxlength(3)*nint( dz*inv_boxl(3) )
5546  end if
5547  r2 = dx**2 + dy**2 + dz**2
5548  if( r2<rpack2 ) then
5549 
5550  !if(dot_product(xtop(3*p_atom-2:3*p_atom) &
5551  ! -xw(:,w_at,w_mol), &
5552  ! xtop(3*p_atom-2:3*p_atom)-xw(:,w_at,w_mol)) &
5553  ! < rpack2) then
5554  keep(w_mol) = .false.
5555  cycle wloop
5556  end if
5557  end if
5558  end do ploop
5559 
5560  !*****PWadded new loop checking water-water distance
5561  if(use_pbc) then
5562  do next_wat = w_mol+1, max_waters
5563  if(.not. keep(next_wat) ) cycle
5564  do next_atom = 1,lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5565  if(.not. wheavy(next_atom) ) cycle
5566  dx = xw(1, w_at, w_mol) - xw(1, next_atom, next_wat)
5567  dy = xw(2, w_at, w_mol) - xw(2, next_atom, next_wat)
5568  dz = xw(3, w_at, w_mol) - xw(3, next_atom, next_wat)
5569  dx = dx - boxlength(1)*nint( dx*inv_boxl(1) )
5570  dy = dy - boxlength(2)*nint( dy*inv_boxl(2) )
5571  dz = dz - boxlength(3)*nint( dz*inv_boxl(3) )
5572  r2 = dx**2 + dy**2 + dz**2
5573  if( r2<rpack2 ) then
5574  keep(w_mol) = .false.
5575  cycle wloop
5576  end if
5577  end do
5578  end do
5579  end if
5580 
5581  end do !w_at
5582  if(keep(w_mol)) then
5583  !this water molecules does not clash with any other heavy atom.
5584  waters_added = waters_added + 1
5585  end if
5586  end do wloop
5587  write(*,130) waters_added
5588 130 format('No. of solvent molecules to add to the system:',i6)
5589 
5590  !increase size of xtop, imakeh
5591  call grow_arrays_for_solvent(waters_added, lib(irc_solvent)%nat)
5592 
5593  do w_mol = 1, max_waters
5594  if(.not. keep(w_mol)) cycle
5595  !move this vater to topology
5596  nwat=nwat+1
5597  nmol = nmol + 1
5598  istart_mol(nmol) = nat_pro + 1
5599  nres = nres + 1
5600  res(nres)%start = nat_pro + 1
5601  res(nres)%irc = irc_solvent
5602  res(nres)%name = lib(irc_solvent)%nam
5603  do w_at = 1, lib(irc_solvent)%nat
5604  nat_pro = nat_pro + 1
5605  !copy coordinates for each atom
5606  xtop(3*nat_pro-2:3*nat_pro) = xw(:,w_at,w_mol)
5607  heavy(nat_pro) = wheavy(w_at)
5608  if(wheavy(w_at)) then
5609  makeh(nat_pro) = .false.
5610  else
5611  makeh(nat_pro) = make_hydrogens
5612  end if
5613  end do
5614  end do
5615 end subroutine add_solvent_to_topology
5616 
5617 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
5618 
5619 subroutine grow_arrays_for_solvent(nmore, atoms_per_molecule)
5620 !make space for nmore more water molecules
5621 !arguments
5622  integer, intent(in) :: nmore, atoms_per_molecule
5623 !locals
5624  real(8), allocatable :: r8temp(:)
5625  logical, allocatable :: ltemp(:)
5626  integer, allocatable :: itemp(:)
5627  integer :: new_nat, nat3old
5628  type(residue_type), allocatable :: restemp(:)
5629 
5630  if(nmore == 0) return
5631 
5632  new_nat = nat_pro + nmore*atoms_per_molecule
5633  nat3old = nat_pro*3
5634  if(allocated(xtop)) then
5635  allocate(r8temp(nat3old), stat=alloc_status)
5636  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5637  r8temp(1:nat3old) = xtop(1:nat3old)
5638  deallocate(xtop)
5639  allocate(xtop(new_nat*3), stat=alloc_status)
5640  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5641  xtop(1:nat3old) = r8temp(1:nat3old)
5642  deallocate(r8temp)
5643  else
5644  allocate(xtop(new_nat*3), stat=alloc_status)
5645  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5646  end if
5647 
5648  if(allocated(makeh)) then
5649  allocate(ltemp(nat_pro), stat=alloc_status)
5650  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5651  ltemp(1:nat_pro) = makeh(1:nat_pro)
5652  deallocate(makeh)
5653  allocate(makeh(new_nat), stat=alloc_status)
5654  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5655  makeh(1:nat_pro) = ltemp(1:nat_pro)
5656  makeh(nat_pro+1:new_nat) = .false.
5657  ltemp(1:nat_pro) = heavy(1:nat_pro)
5658  deallocate(heavy)
5659  allocate(heavy(new_nat), stat=alloc_status)
5660  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5661  heavy(1:nat_pro) = ltemp(1:nat_pro)
5662  heavy(nat_pro+1:new_nat) = .false.
5663  deallocate(ltemp)
5664  else
5665  allocate(makeh(new_nat), heavy(new_nat), stat=alloc_status)
5666  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5667  makeh(1:new_nat) = .false.
5668  heavy(1:new_nat) = .false.
5669  end if
5670 
5671  if(allocated(res)) then
5672  allocate(restemp(nres), stat=alloc_status)
5673  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5674  restemp(1:nres) = res(1:nres)
5675  deallocate(res)
5676  allocate(res(nres + nmore), stat=alloc_status)
5677  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5678  res(1:nres) = restemp(1:nres)
5679  deallocate(restemp)
5680  else
5681  allocate(res(nres + nmore), stat=alloc_status)
5682  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5683  end if
5684 
5685  if(allocated(istart_mol)) then
5686  allocate(itemp(nmol), stat=alloc_status)
5687  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5688  itemp(1:nmol) = istart_mol(1:nmol)
5689  deallocate(istart_mol)
5690  allocate(istart_mol(nmol+nmore), stat=alloc_status)
5691  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5692  istart_mol(1:nmol) = itemp(1:nmol)
5693  deallocate(itemp)
5694  else
5695  allocate(istart_mol(nmol+nmore), stat=alloc_status)
5696  call check_alloc('reallocating topology atom array')
5697  end if
5698 end subroutine grow_arrays_for_solvent
5699 
5700 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
5701 
5702 real function rwat_eff()
5703  ! local variables
5704  integer :: i,kr,isort,bins
5705  real(8) :: rc,rnwat
5706  integer, allocatable :: npro_of_r(:)
5707  real(8) :: rho_ratio, solvent_volume, rho_solvent
5708 
5709  rwat_eff = 0
5710  if ( nwat .eq. 0 ) return
5711 
5712  !make sure to include all waters in topology
5713  bins = int(max(abs(rwat), rexcl_o)*100)+1000
5714  allocate(npro_of_r(bins), stat=alloc_status)
5715  call check_alloc('protein radial distribution array')
5716 
5717 
5718  npro_of_r(:) = 0
5719  do i = 1, nat_solute
5720  rc = sqrt(dot_product(xtop(3*i-2:3*i)-xwcent(:),&
5721  xtop(3*i-2:3*i)-xwcent(:)))
5722  isort = int( 100. * rc )
5723  if ( isort .eq. 0 ) isort = 1
5724  if ( isort .le. bins ) then
5725  if(heavy(i) .and. (.not. excl(i))) &
5726  npro_of_r(isort) = npro_of_r(isort) + 1
5727  end if
5728  end do
5729 
5730  !calc solvent density
5731  solvent_volume = 0.
5732  do i = nres_solute + 1, nres
5733  if(lib(res(i)%irc)%density > 0) then
5734  solvent_volume = solvent_volume + 1./lib(res(i)%irc)%density
5735  end if
5736  end do
5737  rho_solvent = nwat/solvent_volume
5738  ! --- rho_ratio (0.577) comes from dividing the average volume of
5739  ! protein atoms (17.26 A**3) by the volume of a water molecule (29.9 A**3).
5740  rho_ratio = rho_solvent/rho_solute
5741  rnwat = 0.0
5742  do kr = 1, bins
5743  rc = real(kr)*0.01
5744  rnwat = rnwat + 4.*pi*rc*rc*rho_solvent &
5745  *0.01-rho_ratio*npro_of_r(kr)
5746  if ( int(rnwat) >= nwat - nexwat ) exit
5747  end do
5748  rwat_eff = rc
5749 
5750  deallocate(npro_of_r)
5751 end function rwat_eff
5752 
5753 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
5754 
5755 type(tor_codes) function torcode(taci, tacj, tack, tacl)
5756 !arguments
5757  character(KEYLENGTH) :: taci, tacj, tack, tacl
5758 ! *** local variables
5759  integer i
5760  character(KEYLENGTH) :: ti, tj, tk, tl
5761 
5762  ti = wildcard_tac(taci)
5763  tj = wildcard_tac(tacj)
5764  tk = wildcard_tac(tack)
5765  tl = wildcard_tac(tacl)
5766 
5767  torcode%ncod = 0
5768  torcode%cod(:) = 0
5769 
5770  !search for exact match first
5771  do i = 1, ntor_types
5772  if((ti == tor_types(i)%taci .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tacj &
5773  .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tl == tor_types(i)%tacl) &
5774  .or. &
5775  (ti == tor_types(i)%tacl .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tacj &
5776  .and. tl == tor_types(i)%taci)) then
5777 
5778  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5779  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5780  endif
5781  enddo
5782  if(torcode%ncod > 0) return !stop looking if something was found
5783 
5784  !then search with wildcard at i
5785  do i = 1, ntor_types
5786  if(tor_types(i)%taci == '') then
5787  if((tj == tor_types(i)%tacj .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tl == tor_types(i)%tacl) .or. &
5788  (ti == tor_types(i)%tacl .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tacj)) then
5789 
5790  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5791  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5792  endif
5793  endif
5794  enddo
5795  if(torcode%ncod > 0) return !stop looking if something was found
5796 
5797  !then search with wildcard at l
5798  do i = 1, ntor_types
5799  if(tor_types(i)%tacl == '') then
5800  if((ti == tor_types(i)%taci .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tacj .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tack) .or. &
5801  (tj == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tacj .and. tl == tor_types(i)%taci)) then
5802 
5803  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5804  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5805  endif
5806  endif
5807  enddo
5808  if(torcode%ncod > 0) return !stop looking if something was found
5809 
5810  !then search with wildcards at i & l
5811  do i = 1, ntor_types
5812  if(tor_types(i)%taci == '' .and. tor_types(i)%tacl == '') then
5813  if((tj == tor_types(i)%tacj .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tack) .or. &
5814  (tj == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tacj)) then
5815 
5816  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5817  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5818  endif
5819  endif
5820  enddo
5821  if(torcode%ncod > 0) return !stop looking if something was found
5822 
5823  !then search with wildcards at i & j or k & l
5824  do i = 1, ntor_types
5825  if(tor_types(i)%taci == '' .and. tor_types(i)%tacj == '') then
5826  if((tk == tor_types(i)%tack .and. tl == tor_types(i)%tacl) .or. &
5827  (ti == tor_types(i)%tacl .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tack)) then
5828 
5829  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5830  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5831  endif
5832  ELSEif(tor_types(i)%tack == '' .and. tor_types(i)%tacl == '') then
5833  if((ti == tor_types(i)%taci .and. tj == tor_types(i)%tacj) .or. &
5834  (tl == tor_types(i)%taci .and. tk == tor_types(i)%tacj)) then
5835 
5836  torcode%ncod = torcode%ncod + 1
5837  torcode%cod(torcode%ncod) = tor_types(i)%cod
5838  endif
5839  endif
5840  enddo
5841  if(torcode%ncod > 0) return !stop looking if something was found
5842 
5843  write( * , '(a,4(1x,a8))') '>>> Missing torsion type for atom types', &
5844  ti, tj, tk, tl
5845  topo_ok = .false.
5846 
5847 !.......................................................................
5848 end function torcode

5851 
5852 subroutine tors_ene(emax, nlarge, av_ene)
5853 ! *** local variables
5854  integer i, j, k, l, ip, ic, i3, j3, k3, l3, nlarge
5855  real rji(3), rjk(3), rkl(3), rnj(3), rnk(3), bj, bk, scp, &
5856  phi, sgn, pe, dv, rki(3), rlj(3), dp(12), arg, f1, di(3), &
5857  dl(3)
5858  real emax, av_ene
5859 
5860 !.......................................................................
5861 
5862  nlarge = 0
5863  av_ene = 0
5864 
5865  do ip = 1, ntors
5866 
5867  i = tor(ip)%i
5868  j = tor(ip)%j
5869  k = tor(ip)%k
5870  l = tor(ip)%l
5871  ic = tor(ip)%cod
5872  if(ic == 0) then !missing parameter
5873  write(*, '(5i5,1x,a)') ip, i, j, k, l, 'MISSING PARAMETERS'
5874  cycle
5875  end if
5876  i3 = i * 3 - 3
5877  j3 = j * 3 - 3
5878  k3 = k * 3 - 3
5879  l3 = l * 3 - 3
5880  rji(1) = xtop(i3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
5881  rji(2) = xtop(i3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
5882  rji(3) = xtop(i3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
5883  rjk(1) = xtop(k3 + 1) - xtop(j3 + 1)
5884  rjk(2) = xtop(k3 + 2) - xtop(j3 + 2)
5885  rjk(3) = xtop(k3 + 3) - xtop(j3 + 3)
5886  rkl(1) = xtop(l3 + 1) - xtop(k3 + 1)
5887  rkl(2) = xtop(l3 + 2) - xtop(k3 + 2)
5888  rkl(3) = xtop(l3 + 3) - xtop(k3 + 3)
5889  rnj(1) = rji(2) * rjk(3) - rji(3) * rjk(2)
5890  rnj(2) = rji(3) * rjk(1) - rji(1) * rjk(3)
5891  rnj(3) = rji(1) * rjk(2) - rji(2) * rjk(1)
5892  rnk(1) = - rjk(2) * rkl(3) + rjk(3) * rkl(2)
5893  rnk(2) = - rjk(3) * rkl(1) + rjk(1) * rkl(3)
5894  rnk(3) = - rjk(1) * rkl(2) + rjk(2) * rkl(1)
5895  bj = sqrt(rnj(1) **2 + rnj(2) **2 + rnj(3) **2)
5896  bk = sqrt(rnk(1) **2 + rnk(2) **2 + rnk(3) **2)
5897  scp =(rnj(1) * rnk(1) + rnj(2) * rnk(2) + rnj(3) * rnk(3) )&
5898  /(bj * bk)
5899  if(scp>1.0) scp = 1.0
5900  if(scp< - 1.0) scp = - 1.0
5901  phi = acos(scp)
5902  sgn = rjk(1) *(rnj(2) * rnk(3) - rnj(3) * rnk(2) ) + rjk(2)&
5903  *(rnj(3) * rnk(1) - rnj(1) * rnk(3) ) + rjk(3) *(rnj(1) &
5904  * rnk(2) - rnj(2) * rnk(1) )
5905  if(sgn<0) phi = - phi
5906 
5907 ! --- energy
5908 
5909  arg = torlib(ic)%rmult * phi - torlib(ic)%deltor * pi / 180.
5910  pe = torlib(ic)%fk *(1.0 + cos(arg) ) / real(torlib(ic)%paths )
5911 
5912  av_ene = av_ene+pe
5913 
5914  if(pe>emax) then
5915  nlarge = nlarge+1
5916  write( * , '(6i5,5f8.2)') ip, i, j, k, l, ic, torlib(ic)%fk , &
5917  torlib(ic)%rmult , torlib(ic)%deltor , phi * 180. / pi, pe
5918  endif
5919 
5920  enddo
5921 
5922  if(ntors/=0) av_ene = av_ene / real(ntors)
5923 
5924 end subroutine tors_ene

5928 logical function check_residues()
5929 !locals
5930  integer :: i,j
5931 
5932  !stop immediately if no library
5933  if(nlibres == 0 .and. nat_pro > 0) then
5934  check_residues = .false.
5935  write(*, '(a)') '>>>>>ERROR: No library loaded.'
5936  return
5937  end if
5938 
5939  check_residues = .true.
5940  !check that all residues are in the library
5941 resloop:do i = 1, nres
5942 libloop:do j = 1, nlibres
5943  if(res(i)%name ==lib(j)%nam ) then
5944  res(i)%irc = j
5945  cycle resloop
5946  endif
5947  enddo libloop
5948  !if we reach here then the library entry was not found
5949  write(*,'(a,i3,a)') '>>> Residue ',i, ' not found in library: ', &
5950  res(i)%name
5951  check_residues = .false.
5952  enddo resloop
5953 end function check_residues

5957 subroutine writepdb
5958 ! *** local variables
5959  CHARACTER(len=80) :: filnam
5960  character(len=1) :: reply
5961  character(*), parameter :: gap = &
5962  ' GAP '
5963  character(*), parameter :: ter = 'TER '
5964  integer :: i, j, k, l, imol
5965  integer :: iat
5966  integer :: iwrite_g
5967  logical :: wrote_atom_in_molecule
5968  character(len=6) :: pdbtype
5969  integer :: lig(4) !atoms connected to atom i
5970 
5971  if(.not. check_residues()) then
5972  call parse_reset()
5973  return
5974  end if
5975  if(mask%included == 0) then
5976  write(*,900)
5977 900 format('>>>>> ERROR: The mask is empty - no atoms to write!')
5978  return
5979  end if
5980 
5981  write( *, * )
5982  call get_string_arg(filnam, '-----> Name of PBD file: ')
5983  if(openit(3, filnam, 'unknown', 'formatted', 'write') /= 0) then
5984  call parse_reset
5985  return
5986  end if
5987  rewind(3)
5988 
5989 
5990  CALL get_string_arg(reply, '-----> Write out TER cards [y/n] ? ')
5991  select case(reply)
5992  case('y', 'Y')
5993  iwrite_g = 1
5994  case default
5995  iwrite_g = 0
5996  end select
5997 
5998 !PDB standard minus B-factors 10 format(a6,i5,1x,a4,a1,a3,1x,a1,i4,a1,3x,3f8.3)
5999 !See readpdb for specification of the format
6000 !Old format 10 format(a6,i5,2x,a4,a4,i5,4x,3f8.3)
6001 !TODO: Fix writing of chainID, requires chain info in topology.
6002  !(PDBtype,atomNr,atomName,resName,resNr,coords)
6003 10 format(a6,i5,1x,a5,a3,2x,i4,4x,3f8.3)
6004 11 format(a6,11x,a3,2x,i4) !For TER cards
6005  iat = 0
6006  imol = 1
6007  wrote_atom_in_molecule = .false.
6008  do i = 1, nres
6009  if(lib(res(i)%irc )%HETATM) then
6010  pdbtype = 'HETATM'
6011  else
6012  pdbtype = 'ATOM '
6013  end if
6014  do j = 1, lib(res(i)%irc)%nat
6015  iat = iat + 1
6016  !write only atoms in mask
6017  if(mask%mask(iat)) then
6018  write(3, 10) pdbtype, iat, lib(res(i)%irc )%atnam(j), res(i)%name,&
6019  i,xtop(iat*3-2:iat*3)
6020  wrote_atom_in_molecule = .true.
6021  end if
6022  enddo
6023  if(i < nres_solute .and. imol < nmol) then
6024  if(istart_mol(imol + 1) ==iat + 1) then
6025  imol = imol + 1
6026  if(iwrite_g>0 .and. wrote_atom_in_molecule) then
6027  write(3, 11) ter, res(i)%name, i
6028  end if
6029  wrote_atom_in_molecule = .false.
6030  endif
6031  end if
6032  enddo
6033 
6034  !now write connect records for HETATM groups
6035  do i = 1, nres_solute !loop over all solute residues
6036  if(lib(res(i)%irc)%HETATM) then !only for HETATM groups
6037  j = 1
6038  !work through all bonds
6039  do while(j <= lib(res(i)%irc)%nbnd)
6040  !this is the first atom
6041  iat = res(i)%start - 1 + lib(res(i)%irc)%bnd(j)%i
6042  !find a set of up to four bonds from this atom
6043  l = 0
6044  do k = 1,4
6045  lig(k) = res(i)%start - 1 + lib(res(i)%irc)%bnd(j)%j
6046  j=j+1
6047  !include only ligand atoms which are in the mask
6048  if(mask%mask(lig(k))) l = l + 1
6049  if(j>lib(res(i)%irc)%nbnd) exit
6050  !stop if new bond has different i atom
6051  if(res(i)%start - 1 + lib(res(i)%irc)%bnd(j)%i /= iat) exit
6052  end do
6053  if(mask%mask(iat) .and. l>0) write(3,20) iat, lig(1:l)
6054  end do
6055  end if
6056  end do
6057 20 format('CONECT',5i5)
6058 
6059  write( * , '(/,a,/)') 'PDB file successfully written.'
6060 
6061  close(3)
6062 
6063 end subroutine writepdb

6264 !*************************************************************************
6265 !*Sort out atoms in restrained shell. Use protein center to calculate distance.
6266 !*Use coordinates from topology unless 'implicit_rstr_from_file' is specified
6267 !*Swiped from md.f90, needed when using atom masks "not restrained"
6268 !*************************************************************************
6269 subroutine make_shell2
6270 ! *** Local variables
6271  integer :: i,ig,i3,k
6272  real(8) :: rout2,rin2,r2
6273  real(8), allocatable :: cgp_cent(:,:)
6274  nshellats = 0
6275 
6276  rexcl_i = get_real_arg('-----> Inner radius of restrained shell ')
6277 
6278  rin2 = rexcl_i**2
6279 
6280  shell(:) = .false.
6281 
6282  allocate(cgp_cent(3,ncgp+nwat))
6283 
6284  cgp_cent(:,:) = 0.
6285 
6286  do ig=1,ncgp_solute
6287  if (.not. excl(cgp(ig)%iswitch)) then
6288  do i = cgp(ig)%first,cgp(ig)%last
6289  i3 = cgpatom(i)*3
6290  cgp_cent(:,ig) = cgp_cent(:,ig) + xtop(i3-2:i3)
6291  end do
6292  cgp_cent(:,ig) = cgp_cent(:,ig)/real(cgp(ig)%last - cgp(ig)%first +1)
6293  r2 = dot_product(cgp_cent(:,ig)-xpcent(:),cgp_cent(:,ig)-xpcent(:))
6294 
6295  if ( r2 .gt. rin2 ) then
6296  do i=cgp(ig)%first, cgp(ig)%last
6297  nshellats = nshellats + 1
6298  shell(cgpatom(i)) = .true.
6299  end do
6300  end if
6301  end if
6302  end do
6303 
6304  deallocate(cgp_cent)
6305  write(*,105) nshellats, rexcl_i, rexcl_o
6306 105 format('Found ',i6,' solute atoms in the restrained shell region (',f6.2,' to ',f6.2,')')
6307 end subroutine make_shell2

6309 !*************************************************************************
6310 !* Returns true if centre of mass can be assigned
6311 !* and returns centre of mass for a mask of atoms in the vector 'centre'
6312 !*************************************************************************
6313 logical function get_centre_by_mass(centre)
6314 real(8), intent(OUT) :: centre(3)
6315 type(mask_type) :: mask
6316 integer :: ats, imaskat, iat
6317 real(8) :: totmass, mass
6318 get_centre_by_mass = .false.
6319 centre = 0
6320 totmass=0
6321 call mask_initialize(mask)
6322 ats = maskmanip_make_pretop(mask)
6323 if (.not. allocated(iac))allocate(iac(nat_pro))
6324 call set_iac !Set info about masses
6325 do iat = 1,nat_pro
6326  if (mask%mask(iat)) then
6327  if(heavy(iat)) then !skip hydrogens
6328  mass=iaclib(iac(iat))%mass
6329  totmass=totmass+mass
6330  centre = centre + mass*xtop(iat*3-2:iat*3)
6331  end if
6332  end if
6333 end do
6334 centre = centre/totmass
6335 get_centre_by_mass = .true.
6336 end function get_centre_by_mass
